loans.use: to buy maize, groundnuts, and millet.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for a cleaner and more efficient cooking gas package using Liquefied Petroleum Gas.

loans.name: Paraiso Group

texts.es: Antonio tiene 50 años de edad, (es el que aparece de último de izquierda a derecha, viste playera de color blanco), tiene dos hijos, el primero tiene 17 años de edad está en quinto magisterio y el otro tiene 12 años de edad y está en sexto grado primaria, obtiene sus ingresos en la venta de banano de su propio cultivo, lo realiza en la comunidad donde vive porque llegan compradores de muchos lugares y ve esta oportunidad de vender sus productos a un mejor precio, se involucró a ayudar a sus padres cuando tenía 5 años de edad y aprendió como vender, Antonio solicita un préstamo para comprar insumos para el mantenimiento de banano, en el fututo él quiere construir dos casas para sus hijos, se integró al grupo porque ve que cuando estan organizados se obtiene más beneficio.
texts.en:
Antonio is 50 years old. He appears in the photo as the last person on the right, wearing a white colored shirt. He has two children, the first is 17 and is in his 5th year of high school. The other is twelve and in Grade 6 in Primary school.

Antonio makes his money selling bananas that he grows. He does this in the community where he lives as buyers come from all over and this allows him to sell at better prices. He started to help his parents when he was 5 years old so he learned how to sell.

The loan that Antonio is requesting is to buy inputs to care for his banana plants. In the future he wants to build two houses for his children. He joined his communal bank when he saw that you got more benefits when you were organized.

loans.use: to maintain his banana crops.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy clothes and footwear.

loans.name: German

texts.es:
Germán tiene 25 años de edad, vive junto en el distrito de Buenos Aires, una comunidad de clima caluroso, su población se dedica a la agricultura especialmente el cultivo de plátano, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Morropon que pertenece a la Región Piura, costa norte del Perú.

El brinda servicio de mano de obra en las chacras de sus vecino y moradores de su distrito o en las hornilla de la zona, su esposa también se dedica a labores agrícolas, ha solicitado un préstamo de 2 500 nuevos soles para la compra de materiales para la construcción de su vivienda y de esta manera tener un lugar agradable donde residir.
texts.en:
Germán, age 25, lives in the Buenos Aires district.  It is a community with a warm climate, and the population devotes itself to farming, especially growing bananas, commerce, and livestock.  It is located in the Morropon province in the Piura region on the northern coast of Peru.

He provides labor on his neighbors’ and other inhabitants’ farms in his district or in other places in the area.  His wife also works in agriculture.

He has requested a loan for 2,500 soles to buy materials to build his house.  This way he will have a pleasant place to live.

loans.use: to buy materials to build his house.

loans.name: Miguel Angel

texts.es:
Miguel Ángel tiene 35 años de edad, vive en el distrito de Cayaltí, una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Chiclayo que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la crianza y venta de cerdos , es conocido en su comunidad por la labore que realiza, ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 4 000 nuevos soles para la compra de dos cerdos padriles para mejorar la raza de sus animales y de esta manera ofrecerlos a un mejor precio.
texts.en:
Miguel Ángel is 35 years old and lives in the district of Cayaltí, located in the Province of Chiclayo, Lambayeque Region on the North Coast of Peru. The people here work in farming commerce and raise livestock.

Miguel raises and sells pigs. He is known in his community for his work. He has requested a loan from Edpyme Alternativa for 4,000 PEN to buy two young pigs to improve the pedigree of his animals and in this way get a better price for them.

loans.use: to buy two pigs to improve the quality of his animals.

loans.name: William

texts.es:
William tiene 43 años de edad, vive al lado de su esposa y sus hijos vive en su casa de material rustico del distrito de Callayuc, una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Cutervo que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la agricultura especialmente al cultivo de arroz de la variedad pitipo, se dedica a esta actividad desde hace tres años, ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2 000 nuevos soles para el pago de mano de obra a joranleros por el mantenimiento de su cultivo de arroz y de esta manera tener una producción oportuna para ofrecer a sus clientes.
texts.en:
William is 43 years old and lives with his wife and children in his house, constructed of rustic material, in Callayuc District. This community, located in Cutervo Province, in the Cajamarca Region of Peru's northern sierra, is dedicated to agriculture, commerce, and cattle raising.

William is a farmer who specializes in cultivating rice of the Pitipo variety. He has been growing this rice for the last 3 years. 

William is requesting a loan through Edpyme Alternativa for 2,000 new sols in order to pay day laborers to care for his rice crop. In this manner, he can  have a harvest to offer his customers at the opportune moment.

loans.use: to pay day laborers to  maintain his rice crop.

loans.name: Cruz Idelso

texts.es:
Idelso tiene 33 años de edad, vive en su propia casa de material rústico, en el Caserío Cuyca, una zona rural del Distrito de Colasay, una comunidad de clima caluroso, ubicada al margen de la carretera Olmos – Corral Quemado, a una hora de la ciudad de Jaén que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la crianza y comercialización de ganado vacuno, también se dedica al cultivo de plátano ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1 000 nuevos soles para la compra de abonos para su cultivo de plátano y de esta manera tener una producción oportuna para ofrecer a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Idelso, age 33, lives in his own house made of crude materials in the Cuyca settlement.  It is a rural area in the Colasay district.  The community has a warm climate, and it is located on the edge of the Olmos – Corral Quemado road.  It is one hour from the city of Jaén, which is in the Cajamarca region in the northern highlands of Peru.

He raises and sells cows.  He also grows bananas.  He has requested a loan from Edpyme Alternativa for 1,000 soles to buy fertilizers for his banana crop.  This way he will have a timely production to offer his customers.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for his banana crop.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy clothing and footwear

loans.name: Carlos Enrique

texts.es:
Carlos de 23 años de edad, es un joven que estudio hasta bachillerato, está soltero vive con los papas y dos hermanos, él trabaja y les ayuda a los padres.

Carlos trabaja en la apicultura desde que tenía 10 años de edad, ya que el padre se dedicaba a esto y cuando  salió de estudiar decidió dedicarse a esto; por el momento está trabajando con un señor que tiene abejas, pero ya está viendo como pone algo que sea propio y así los ingresos sean mucho mejor este trabajo lo hace de un horario de las 6 am a las 2 pm

El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar cajones para criar las abejas, ya que él se siente capaz de poder manejar una crianza, ya tiene la experiencia y quiere independizarse y trabajar en lo propio así le va ayudar a los papas y cuando él tenga su familia dar lo mejor.  

Los sueños de Carlos es tener su propio negocio de las colmenas, es su mayor deseo  esto lo lograra con el trabajo y el sacrificio que se hace de trabajar pesado y salir adelante.
texts.en:
Carlos is 23 years old and finished his high school studies. He is single and lives with his parents and two siblings. He works and helps his parents. Carlos has worked in beekeeping since he was 10 years old, because his father was in this line of work. When he finished school he decided to make a living from beekeeping. At the moment he is working with a man who has bees, but he is looking into how to set up something of his own so that his income will be much better. He works from 6am to 2pm. 

He is asking for the loan to buy boxes for keeping bees, since he feels he is capable of looking after his own bees. He already has experience and wants to set up independently and work on something of his own. By doing this he will help his parents and be able to provide the best when he has a family of his own.

Carlos's dream is to have his own business with beehives; this is his greatest wish. He will achieve this through work and the sacrifice which comes from working hard, and will make progress in life.

loans.use: to buy boxes for keeping bees.

loans.name: Abdul

texts.en:
Abdul runs a small stall which sells mobile phone airtime credits and mobile accessories. He has been running this stall for one year.  Abdul lives in Indramayu, a semi-urban area about 6 hours from Jakarta.  Abdul is married.

To increase the family income, Abdul also works as a dealer.  He joined Ruma one month ago  to increase his income and feels really excited to expand his business selling mobile phone airtime credits and processing bill payments for customers. 

Abdul is starting to process electricity bill payments for his customers, which is a much needed service in the area and will increase his income.  To provide this new service, Abdul is required to print out receipts for customers.  A Kiva loan will help him purchase this printer and be able to offer the new service.

loans.use: To process more mobile phone credit sales and bill payment transactions using a printer

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy pepper, oil, salt, etc., to attract her customers.

loans.name: Juan Manuel

texts.es:
Juan de 43 años de edad, estudio hasta bachillerato, está acompañado; la esposa se dedica a la venta de papelería en una librería.  Juan aún no ha procreado hijos.

Juan  se dedica a la agricultura desde que tenía 12 años  y a la ganadería  este trabajo se lo enseño el Papá,   él siempre ha querido lo mejor para él; pero también Juan se ha dedicado a la ganadería eso ha visto que le ha generado ingresos ya que junto con el padre alquilan terrenos por mayoreo y de ahí ellos distribuyen las parcelas para alquilarlas a los agricultores en pequeños y en una parte del terreno tienen ganado, ellos compran y los engordan y luego los venden pero también venden la leche de las vacas y el queso fresco esto les genera muchos ingreso. 

Juan con el préstamo solicitado, lo necesitara  para pagar el alquiler de 70,000 metros cuadrados  de tierra 28,000 metros cuadrados las alquilaran a unos familiares y las demás las ocuparan ellos para cultivar el maíz y también para tener las vacas que son ellas que les están dando el sostén de la casa, esto les da el ingreso a él y a su esposa pero también le ayuda al papá y a la mamá.
 
Los sueños que tiene es que siempre Dios le preste vida para seguir trabajando en la ganadería y en la agricultura,  ya que no ha podido conseguir un empleo, y cuando ya tenga sus hijos poder enseñarles el trabajo ya que es un trabajo digno.
texts.en:
Juan is 43 and studied up to high school, he has a companion; a wife who works at a library selling stationary. Juan does not have children yet. 

Juan has worked in agriculture since he was 12, his father taught him this work and he has always wanted the best for him. However, Juan also works in cattle raising and has seen it generate income as his father and him rent terrain at wholesale, distribute the plots for rental to smaller farmers and hold cattle in another part of the land. They buy, fatten and then sell the cattle, but also sell the milk from the cows as well as fresh cheese which generates substantial incomes.

Juan needs the credit applied for to pay for the rent on 70,000 square meters of land. 28,000 square meters will be rented to some family members and the rest will be used to grow corn and also hold the cattle that is supporting the home, providing income for him and his wife, but also helping his dad and his mom. 

His dream is for god to always provide him with life to keep working in ranching and agriculture, since he has not been able to obtain employment, and when he has children be able to teach them the trade since it is dignified work.

loans.use: pay for rent on 70,000 square meters of land

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy clothes for resale

loans.name: Siska

texts.en:
Siska runs a small stall which sells mobile phone airtime credits and mobile accessories. She has been running this stall for onr year.  Siska lives in Solo, a semi-urban area about 15 hours by car from Jakarta.  Siska is married.

To increase the family income, Siska also works as a dealer.  She joined Ruma four months ago to increase her income and feels really excited to expand her business selling mobile phone airtime credits and processing bill payments for customers. 

Siska is starting to process electricity bill payments for her customers, which is a much needed service in the area and will increase her income.  To provide this new service, Siska is required to print out receipts for customers.  A Kiva loan will help her purchase this printer and be able to offer the new service.

loans.use: To process more mobile phone credit sales and bill payment transactions using a printer

loans.name: Zulfatun

texts.en:
Zulfatun runs a small stall which sells mobile phone airtime credits and mobile accessories. She has been running this stall for one and half years.  Zulfatun lives in Bekasi, a semi-urban area about two hours from Jakarta.  Zulfatun is married.

To increase the family income, Zulfatun also works as a dealer.  She joined Ruma one month ago to increase her income and feels really excited to expand her business selling mobile phone airtime credits and processing bill payments for customers. 

Zulfatun is starting to process electricity bill payments for her customers, which is a much needed service in the area and will increase her income.  To provide this new service, Zulfatun is required to print out receipts for customers.  A Kiva loan will help her purchase this printer and be able to offer the new service.

loans.use: To process more mobile phone credit sales and bill payment transactions using a printer

loans.name: Illimani Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “ILLIMANI” iniciará el primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Alto Lima, está compuesta por ocho  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Yola es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: repostera, tienda de barrio, tejidos de ropa de bebe, venta de papas fritas, librería, venta de chinelas, venta de ropa, tejido de mantas de vicuña.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Yola es integrante, ella indica que hace doce años que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una compañera de la institución que fue a visitarle a su casa. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de elaboración y venta empanadas y masitas; da a conocer que este negocio lo aprendió en un centro de formación y posteriormente decide emprender un negocio en su zona.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de harina por mayor) que adquirirá de las tiendas distribuidoras de la ciudad de El Alto y posteriormente a la elaboración lo implementará en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia, ya que ella es casada  y tiene cuatro hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el crédito que ofrece la institución.
texts.en:
The Communal Bank “Illimani” is starting its first loan cycle with Pro Mujer as part of the Alto Lima Community Center. This group consists of eight members and is led by a Board of Directors in which Sra. Yola is the president. The members of this Communal Bank engage in various businesses such as making pastries, managing a neighborhood store, knitting baby clothes, selling potato chips, managing a bookstore, selling slippers, selling clothes, and weaving blankets from vicuña wool.

This loan will benefit small business owners such as Sra. Yola. She says that she joined Pro Mujer 12 years ago after receiving an invitation from another member of the organization who visited her at her house. Yola currently has a business of making and selling empanadas and snacks. She is knowledgeable about this business because she learned these skills at a training center. Later on, she decided to establish a business in her area.

The loan she is receiving now will be used to increase her capital for buying flour in bulk. She acquires her supplies from the distribution stores in the city of El Alto and then uses them to make the products she sells from her retail space. Working in this manner enables her to generate income to support her family. Yola is married and has four children.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, Yola said that she enjoys the loans offered by the organization.

loans.use: to buy flour in bulk.

loans.name: Andrea

texts.es:
Andrea actualmente está trabajando y estudiando a la vez, con lo que podrá mejorar su calidad de vida, la de su esposa y la de toda su familia.
Su sueño es poder contar con un título universitario que le abrirá muchas puertas para poder ser alguien en la vida.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en sus gastos de titulación, ya que está por terminar su carrera de Administración de empresas agropecuarias, y necesita cubrir dicho gasto.
texts.en:
Andrea is currently working and studying at the same time, with the hopes of improving the quality of her life, that of her husband and all of her family. Her dream is to be able to have a university degree that will open the doors to enable her to make something of herself. 
She is asking for his loan in order to invest in the cost of tuition. She is almost finished with her degree in Agricultural and Livestock Administration and she needs to finish paying for these last classes.

loans.use: pay tuition costs.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es:
Rosa viene de una familia muy unida y trabajadora siempre se ayudaron los unos a los otros.
Una de sus metas es recibirse y ser una profesional y trabajar en su profesión y además habilitar un negocio en su casa. Está estudiando la carrera de Licenciatura en Contabilidad, donde su mayor inspiración es su familia porque quiere lo mejor para ellos.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en pagar sus cuotas y en sus gastos de manutención. Agradece por la ayuda que está recibiendo de seguir sus suelos.
texts.en:
Rosa comes from a close knit and hard working family. They have always been there to help one another. 
One of her goals it to get a degree and become a professional and to be able to work in her profession, as well as start a business from home. She is studying for a degree in Accounting. Her biggest inspiration is her family because she wants the best for them. 
She is asking for this loan in order to invest in paying fees and child care costs. She is thankful for the help that she is getting in order to follow her dreams.

loans.use: pay for university costs and child care.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more plates, spoons, bowls, pans, tubs, etc. to sell.

loans.name: Embassy Group

texts.en:
Kibuna is a mother of two children, a boy and a girl, both of whom are in school. She is in her early 30s and is single. 

Since 2005, Kibuna makes her living by running a beauty salon. She operates her salon from 8am to 10pm per working day and is able to make a good monthly profit.

From Tujijenge Tanzania, this is her first loan request which she will use to buy a salon dryer. She dreams of expanding her business and making her life better. 

Kibuna will share this loan with her loan group, Embassy Group, which totals three members. The members of the group will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy a salon dryer.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more dried fish for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more soap, candy and biscuits for her business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy clothing at wholesale to sell.

loans.name: José Samuel

texts.es:
José de 40 años de edad,  estudio hasta segundo grado de nivel académico, está acompañado la esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos ha procreado 5 hijos  en este matrimonio.

José se dedica a la agricultura desde que tenía 13 años de edad, este trabajo lo aprendió  ayudnadole a los tios le enseñaron este oficio, ya que lo aconsejan que esto le serviria de mucho y que lo aprendiera y hoy en dia ve que si le sirve, ya que eso es la fuente de ingreso que tienen en la familia de ahi mantiene a sus hijos y a la esposa, para llegar a su lugar de trabajo viaja a pie en un horario de 6 am a las 11 am.

El préstamo que esta solicitando es para pagar el alquiler de la tierra donde cultiva el maíz,  ya que ha decidido cultivar porque el tiempo suele estar mejor para la agricultura y aunque sea para la familia esto le ayudara mucho.

Los sueños que tiene es siempre trabajar para que la familia tenga los alimentos y que no les falten más,  también que sus hijos vayan a la escuela para que un día ellos salgan profesionales, ya que es la única herencia que les puede dar.
texts.en:
José is 40 years old. He studied until the second grade. He has a wife who is dedicated to household duties. They have five children. 

José has been dedicated to farming since he was 13 years old. He learned this job from his uncles. They advised him that this would serve him well
Today, he sees that it does serve him well. It is a source of income for the family including his children and wife. In order to get  to work, he travels on foot from six a.m. to 11 a.m. 

The loan he is requesting will pay the rent for plot where he grows corn. He decided to farm because the weather is better for farming and for his family, this will help a lot. 

The dreams he has are to always work for his family to have food and never lack for it anymore, also fro his children to go to school so that one day they can be professionals, since this is the only inheritance he can give them.

loans.use: pay rent for the land where grows corn.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy electrical goods and furniture

loans.name: Direct

texts.en:
Greetings from Zimbabwe! This is 31-year-old Direct from Gokwe. He is married with two children, one of whom attends school. He also cares for one other dependent. 

Direct runs a retail business selling furniture: wardrobes, beds and room dividers. The business has been in operation for four years. He says the main challenges he faces are high transport costs and the lack of working capital. Direct has requested a loan of $500 to purchase furniture for resale. He says the extra income generated as a result of this loan will allow him to increase his working capital, and ultimately sales and profits as well. In the future Direct plans to increase his stock and sell a vast array of products.

loans.use: to buy furniture for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy clothing and shoes.

loans.name: Timothy

texts.en:
Greetings from Zimbabwe! This is 36-year-old Timothy from Harare. He is married with two children, one of whom attends school. 

Timothy runs a retail business selling hardware. The business has been in operation for four years. He says the main challenge he faces is price competition from unregulated sellers trading without overhead expenses such as rentals. 

Timothy has requested a loan of US$300 to buy hardware for resale in his shop. He says the extra income generated as a result of this loan will allow him to increase profits and increase his disposable income. In the future, Timothy plans to open another hardware shop in the city centre.

loans.use: to purchase hardware for resale.

loans.name: Zvarimwa

texts.en:
Greetings from Zimbabwe! This is 35-year-old Zvarimwa from Gokwe. She is widowed with two children, both of whom attend school. She also cares for one other dependent. 

Zvarimwa runs a business selling clothes and school uniforms, which she gets from abroad and locally. The business has been in operation for four years. She says the main challenges are a lack of access to cheaper funds and high transport costs. 

Zvarimwa has requested a loan of US$1,500 to purchase clothes and school uniforms for resale. She says the extra income generated as a result of this loan will allow her to send her children to better schools. In the future Zvarimwa plans to open three more boutiques in town.

loans.use: to buy clothes and school uniforms for resale.

loans.name: Daniel

texts.en:
Greetings from Bulawayo, the second largest city in Zimbabwe. Daniel is 39 years old and married with six children, three of whom attend school. 

For the past 12 years Daniel has run a retail shop selling mobile phones and accessories. His biggest challenge has been high rentals for the shop space. 

Daniel has requested a US$750 loan to buy mobile phones and accessories for resale. He says the profit generated from this loan will help pay school fees for his children and renovate his house. In the near future, Daniel plans to open a wholesale business for mobile phones and accessories.

loans.use: to buy mobile phones and accessories.

loans.name: Sabrina Yamileth

texts.es:
Sabrina  de 28 años de edad, estudio hasta sexto grado,  está casada, es  madre de dos hijos su esposo trabaja como seguridad, sus hijos vive junto con sus padres y la actividad que ella realiza es la agricultura y a la venta de cosméticos por revistas es  de donde tiene ingresos para ella y su hijos.

Sabrina se dedica a la agricultura, actividad que realiza desde hace 10 años por lo que tiene mucha experiencia en dicha actividad la cual aprendió de sus padres dado al índice de pobreza de sus padres, no pudo estudiar por lo tanto no pudo optar a otra actividad;  por lo que tuvo que dedicarse a la agricultura junto a sus padres actividad que realizan a pocos metros de su casa; además los fines de semana se dedica a la venta de pupusas.
                                  
El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar semilla , abono y otros insumos para su cultivo de maíz, espera que gracias al crédito podrá tener una mejor producción en su cosecha y mejores ingresos a su familia y poder cancelar el crédito con la ganancia cubrir algunos gastos de su familia. 

Sabrina manifestó que sus sueños son tener una vivienda digna y poderle dar la educación que ella no tuvo a su pequeños hijos, quiera que Dios le de vida y salud para lograrlo.
texts.en:
Sabrina  is 28 years old and studied as far as sixth grade. She is married and has two children who live with them and her parents. Her husband works as a security guard and she makes a living from agriculture and selling cosmetics from catalogues. This is how she makes an income for herself and her children.

Sabrina works in agriculture and has been doing this for 10 years, so she has a lot of experience in it. She learnt the skills from her parents. Due to her parents' level of poverty, she was not able to study further and so she has no other options for work. Because of this she had to work in agriculture alongside her parents, working just a few metres away from their house. As well as this she sells pupusas [thick corn tortillas stuffed with cheese, fried pork rind, chicken, or refried beans] at the weekends.

She will use the loan she is requesting to buy seed, manure and other supplies for growing her corn. She hopes that with the help of the loan she will be able to get a better yield of her harvest and provide more income for her family. She hopes to pay off the loan with the profit and cover some of the family's expenses.

Sabrina says that her dream is to have a decent home and to be able to give her young children the education that she didn't have. She hopes God will give her life and health to achieve this.

loans.use: to buy seed, manure and other supplies for growing her corn.

loans.name: Lucy

texts.en:
Lucy is requesting a new loan to buy sewing materials. This investment would give a better image to her products, would increase the inventory and better cover the needs of her customers, and would allow her to keep sewing for her customers. 

Thanks to her previous loan, she was able to expand her business, improve sales and increase her income. She has repaid all her debts and has financial stability, providing her family with better living conditions.

loans.use: To buy sewing materials

loans.name: Rose

texts.en:
Rose is 32 years old and a Dansoman resident. She is an enterprising and active young woman. Rose earns her living by working at the market. She sells second hand clothing market located in the central part of the city. This business allows her to generate sufficient income so that she can sustain herself. 

With the intent of strengthening her business and fulfilling her dream of expansion, Rose is requesting support with this loan so that she can buy inventory in bulk (second hand clothing). As a result, she will be able to offer her customers a choice of variety of clothing, as well as satisfy their needs and tastes. With this loan she will notice an improvement in her income, which would allow her to enjoy a better quality of life over time.

loans.use: To buy inventory in bulk (second hand clothing).

loans.name: Nyame Tease Group

texts.en:
These ladies are part of the group called Nyame Tease. The group is composed of two people who live in the same district. They meet once a week to repay loans, deposit savings and receive training.

Diana is the featured borrower. She is standing to the left in the photograph. She operates a boutique selling menswear and ladies' dresses and has over ten years of experience. She is 37 years old and single. Her day goes from 10:00 AM to 8:00 PM. She has been supporting herself and works hard to cover her expenses. 

She is asking for a loan of GHS 5,800 to buy more inventory to better serve her clients. In the future, she would like to bolster her business and satisfy her customers with the help of the micro-finance institution.

loans.use: to buy and sell menswear and ladies' dresses.

loans.name: Eder

texts.es:
Eder es una persona que lucha por superarse cada día mas, su inspiración es mejorar su vida, y ayudar a su familia.
Su mama la ayuda a siempre en todo lo que tiene a su alcance, para poder seguir estudiando. Quiere ser una buena profesional con muchas ganas de servir a los demás.
Él está estudiando la carrera de ciencias Contables, y cuenta que pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en pagar sus cuotas de la universidad, y de esa forma seguir luchando por sus metas.
texts.en:
Eder is a person who strives to better himself every day, driven by his desire to improve his life and help his family. His mom always does everything she can to help him so that he can continue his studies. He wants to be a good professional and is eager to serve others. 

He is studying Accounting Sciences, and is requesting this loan to invest in paying his university fees, and thus keep striving to reach his goals.

loans.use: to pay university fees

loans.name: Victor

texts.es:
Victor actualmente estoy cursando la carrera de derecho, el tercer año, vive con sus padres quienes le han dado la enseñanza necesaria para crecer siendo responsable.
Su meta es recibirse y poder ser alguien en la vida, es por eso que está luchando día a día, y de esa forma poder estar cerca de su sueño. Él es una persona muy luchadora.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en pagar sus cuotas, ya que le permitirá seguir estudiando y estar cerca de su meta.
texts.en:
Victor is currently enrolled in a law degree program and he is in his third year. He lives with his parents who have raised him to grow up to be a responsible young man. 
His goal is to get his degree and to make something of himself, something he is fighting for every day. He is a very determined person. 
He is asking for this loan in order to invest in paying school fees. This will allow him to continue studying and to get closer to achieving his goal.

loans.use: pay for university costs.

loans.name: Dalia Carolina

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Narcisa Del Jesús  se reúne cada quince días en el Cantón Jipijapa, cantón conocido con el nombre de la sultana del café por los extensos cultivos de café el cual tiene un sabor incomparable, por su gastronomía y por la calidez de su gente. 
En este lugar vive la señorita Dalia, tiene 19 años de edad y es soltera, vive en casa de sus padres mientras esta en esta ciudad ya que ella estudia una carrera universitaria en la ciudad de Guayaquil donde alquila un departamento para seguir con sus estudios. 
Doña Dalia es una jovencita muy trabajadora que para obtener sus propios recursos y con esto pagar sus estudios se dedica a la venta de ropa, zapatos por catalogo, sabanas y productos de Yanbal (productos de belleza, cosméticos, perfumería y accesorios para damas). La mayor parte de sus ventas las realiza en su centro de estudios ya que sus compañeras son sus mejores clientes, su mamá también le ayuda vendiendo por la localidad y ella también lo hace ya que todos los fines de semana regresa a la casa de sus padres y sale a vender por este lugar,  así ella logra obtener ingresos que le sirven para seguir adelante ya que los gastos son muchos y ella quiere ser una profesional.
Este crédito es para comprar ropa, zapatos, sabanas y cosméticos. Este es el cuarto ciclo en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta por la ayuda que le dan. Sus sueños es ser una gran profesional.
texts.en:
The Narciso del Jesus Credit Group meets each 15 days in Canton Jipijapa, a region known as the sultan of coffee due to its extensive plantings of its coffee, which has an incomparable flavor, and for its gastronomy, and the quality of its people. 

Dalia, who is 19 years old and single, resides here. She lives in her parents' house while she is in this city. Also, Dalia is preparing for a career at the university in Guayaquil, where she rents an apartment while pursuing her studies. 

Dalia is a very hard-working young woman who, in order to obtain her own resources and, with this, to pay for her studies, is dedicated to selling clothing and shoes from a catalog, plus sheets and Yanbal products (beauty products, cosmetics, perfume, and ladies accessories). Most of her sales are made at her studies center -- her companions are her best customers. Dalia's mother also helps by selling in her locality and Dalia also does this every weekend when she returns to her parents' home and goes out to sell in this city. Thus, she manages to obtain income that helps her forge ahead, since her expenses are considerable and Dalia wants to become a professional.

The loan is for purchasing clothing, shoes, sheets, and cosmetics. This is the Credit Group's 4th loan cycle and they are happy with the available loans. Their dreams are to become professionals.

loans.use: buy clothing, shoes, sheets and cosmetics to sell, in order to pay for her studies.

loans.name: Felipe

texts.es:
Felipe vive en casa de su hermana, es soltero, y actualmente está siguiendo la carrera de Administración de Empresas. Trabaja en una empresa Aseguradora.
Cuenta que su aspiración es poder llegar a ejercer su profesión, y poder destacarse como un profesional integro que pueda ayudar a las demás personas.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en pagar las cuotas de su universidad, y de esa forma seguir estudiando, y luchando por cumplir su meta.
texts.en: Felipe lives with his sister, he is single, and he is currently studying for a degree in Business Administration. He works at an insurance company. His aspiration is to be able to exercise his profession when he is done studying. He wants to be able to prove himself to be an upstanding individual and to be able to help others. He is asking for this loan in order to invest in paying university fees. This will allow him to continue studying and fighting to achieve his goal.

loans.use: pay university costs.

loans.name: Gloria

texts.es:
Gloria es estudiante del segundo año en la carrera de Técnico Superior en Rehabilitación Física.
Trabaja  como niñera en una casa de familia.  Vive con su mamá y sus hermanos.
Sus metas futuras son trabajar en su profesión y poder sobresalir como una buena profesional. En esta ocasión debe presentarse a unos exámenes de regularización de materias que no puedo completar en fecha. Ella Anhela  realizarse profesionalmente y  lograr su progreso y el bienestar de su familia.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en pagar sus cuotas, y así seguir con sus estudios, que es lo que mas anhela.
texts.en:
Gloria is a second year student studying physical rehabilitation at university.

She works as a family nanny and lives with her mother and siblings.

Gloria's future goals are to work in her chosen profession and to excel in her field. Gloria needs to sit some exams for subjects that she was not able to finish on time. Gloria wants to work in her profession and make progress in life and help her family's well-being.

Gloria is applying for this loan in order to pay university fees and to continue with her studies, her greatest desire.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Olga

texts.es:
Olga vive con sus padres, se dedica a vender ropas y joyas de platería, realiza sus ventas en la zona de Capiatá, san Lorenzo y su medio de transporte es una moto que ella misma conduce.
Ella trabaja para poder estudiar la carrera que escogió, que es la de Derecho, y comenta que su anhelo es trabajar en lo que va ser su profesión y tener un salón de ventas de ropas, ella va a la facultad de tarde, y de esa forma está saliendo adelante.
Olga quiere este préstamo para poder cubrir las cuotas de su universidad, y así seguir luchando como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Olga lives with her parents and works selling clothes and gold jewellery. She makes her sales in the Capiatá area of San Lorenzo, arriving there on motorbike.

Olga works in order to be able to study her chosen subject - law. She tells us that she wants to work in this profession and to have her own clothes boutique. Olga studies in the evenings and is getting ahead in life.

Olga is applying for this loan in order to pay university fees and to continue fighting for her goals.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Jorge

texts.es:
Jorge vive con sus padres y trabaja  en el negocio de la familia, ellos se dedican a la compra-venta de electrodomésticos.
Él está estudiando la carrera de administración de empresas, y comenta que sus metas futuras es la de recibirse, poder trabajar en lo que es  su profesión, para obtener  mejores ingresos y seguir estudiando  y ayudar a sus padres.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de libros y también poder pagar las cuotas de su universidad. Ella Agradece por la oportunidad que está recibiendo de seguir estudiando como lo viene haciendo, y luchando por sus metas.
texts.en:
Jorge lives with his family and works at the family business buying and selling electrical appliances.

Jorge is studying business management and tells us that his future goals are to finish his degree and work in his chosen profession. He wants to do this in order to earn a higher income, to continue studying and to help his parents.

Jorge is applying for this loan in order to pay university fees and to buy books. He is grateful for this opportunity to continue studying and fighting for his goals.

loans.use: to pay university fees and to buy books.

loans.name: Diana

texts.es:
Diana  es de la ciudad de San Lorenzo, y su sueño es terminar su Carrera y ser una Buena Profesional  en Admistracion de Empresas. Comenta que muy joven perdió a su padre y que su madre la ha ayudado siempre en todo lo que pudo. Es una persona muy sacrificada que está luchando por salir adelante.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar sus cuotas, y también para cubrir sus gastos de libros y copias. Agradece por esta oportunidad que está recibiendo de seguir luchando por sus estudios.
texts.en:
Diana is from the city of San Lorenzo and her dream is to finish her degree and be a good professional in the field of business management. Diana tells us that she lost her father at a very young age and that her mother has helped her with everything that she could. Diana is a very self-sacrificing person and is fighting to get ahead.

Diana is applying for this loan in order to pay university fees and cover the costs of books and photocopies. She is grateful for this opportunity to continue fighting for her education.

loans.use: to pay university fees and cover the costs of books and photocopies.

loans.name: Shova

texts.en: Shova is 30 years old. She is married and has 2 children aged 10 and 3.  Many years ago, she established her shoe shop business.  Working 6 days a week and 8 hours a day, she supports her family.  She has already received and successfully repaid 2 loans from Patan BPW and used her most recent one to buy different shoes for her business.  In the future, Shova plans to uplift the economic condition of her family.  She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy shoes for her shop.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more Lappa for her business.

loans.name: José Francisco

texts.es:
José de 27 años de edad,  estudio hasta bachillerato, está casado y su esposa tiene una pequeña venta de pupusas, por lo que también contribuye a  los gastos de la familia.

Él se dedica a la pesca artesanal actividad que realiza des de que tenía doce años, lo aprendido  de sus padres, ya que en la zona es la actividad  a la que se pueden dedicar, también su esposa tiene una venta de pupusas en la que también se involucra él,  actividad que realizan en su casa todas las tardes.

El préstamo que está solicitando, es para mejorar el local en donde vende pupusas y comprar bebida y materia prima para la elaboración de pupusas , gracias al crédito podrá darles mejor servicio a sus clientes y a los turistas  que visitan la zona y además podrá tener más ingresos  para su familia.

El cliente manifiesta  que en un futuro planea hacer un negocio grande y poder preparar  académicamente  a sus  hijos, poder mejorar su vivienda. También manifestó que  solo con los créditos  lo lograra y con las ganancias de su negocio y el esfuerzo que él ponga.
texts.en:
José is 27 year old and finished his Secondary school studies. He is married and his wife has a small business selling pupusas. José does small scale fishing something he has done for the last two years. He learned this from his parents as it is a common activity in their area. He is also involved in his wife's pupusas sales something he does every evening.

The loan he is requesting is to improve the space where they sell the pupusas and buy drinks and raw materials to make the pupusas. Thanks to the loan they can provide better service to their clients and to the tourists who visit the area. They can also make more income for their family.

José says that he wants to have a large business in the future, educate his children and make improvements on his house. He adds that he can only do this through the loans and through his effort and the profits from his business.

loans.use: to improve the space where he sells pupusas and buy drinks and raw materials to make pupusas.

loans.name: Eria

texts.en:
Eria is 21 years old and married with one child. He lives in Bundibugyo, Uganda. He is dealing in a cocoa business as his major business, and owns a retail shop selling salt, sugar, and books, among other items, as a side income for his family. 

He is a hardworking man amidst the strong competition from his other business partners. 

Eria intends to use the loan to buy more cocoa so as to continue in business.

loans.use: to buy cocoa.

loans.name: Sylvia

texts.en:
This is 42-year-old Sylvia from Harare, the capital of Zimbabwe, which means "he who does not sleep." She is widowed with one child who attends school.  

Sylvia runs a retail business selling second-hand furniture: sofas, desks, beds, electronics and chairs. The business has been in operation for one year. She says the main challenge is low levels of working capital. Sylvia has requested a loan of US$500 to buy second-hand furniture for resale. The extra income generated from this loan will allow her to pay school fees for her child. In the future Sylvia plans to open two or three shops in town.

loans.use: to buy second-hand furniture.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy fabric and a sewing machine.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more products and renovate his workplace.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy an iron, table and sewing machine.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy a sewing machine and fabric.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more grocery products and renovate his workplace.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more grocery products and renovate his workplace.

loans.name: Arco Iris Group

texts.es: Aura es una persona de 32 años de edad (es la que aparece de último en la foto de izquierda a derecha) tiene 5 hijos, estudian el nivel primario, son menores de edad, vive en el municipio de Chichicastenango, departamento de El Quiché, se dedica a vender ropa típica de su comunidad, obtiene buena ganancia de esta actividad, con ello ayuda a su familia con los gastos familiares, solicita un préstamo para invertir en la compra y venta de zapatos  sería  otra de su actividades, ya que en su comunidad no hay negocio de este tipo y todas las persona tiene que salir al municipio para adquirir este producto, con las ganancia Aura quiere darles una mejor condición de vida a sus pequeños hijos.
texts.en: Aura is 32 (she appears last from from left to right) and has 5 children. They are in elementary school and are underage. She lives in the Chichicastenango municipality of the the El Quiché department. She sells typical clothing of her community and earns a good income with this activity which she uses to help with family expenses. She is applying for a loan to invest in the purchase of shoes to sell, which would be another of her activities, since in her community there is not this type of business and everyone has to leave the municipality to acquire this product. With the gains, Aura wants to give her small children a better quality of life.

loans.use: purchase shoes for sale

loans.name: Aurelia

texts.es:
Aurelia tiene 60 años de edad, vive junto en el distrito de Zaña, una comunidad ubicada cerca al valle del Río Jequetepeque, lo que le ha permitido desarrollarse mediante la agricultura, comercio y ganadería a una hora de la ciudad de Chiclayo que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales en su domicilio posee: patos, pavos, gallinas y cuyes, también tiene ganado vacuno, es una madre emprendedora, ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 3 000 nuevos soles para la compra de alimentos balanceados para engorde de sus animales y una segunda parte para compra de mayor cantidad de animales para ofrecer a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Aurelia, 60, lives in the district of Zaña, a community located close to the valley of the Jequetepeque river, which has allowed the community to develop through farming, livestock and commerce. It is one hour away from the city of Chiclayo, located in the Lambayeque region, in the northern coast of Peru.
Aurelia breeds and sells animals in her residence. She owns ducks, turkeys, hens, guinea pigs and also cattle. She is an enterprising mother and has asked for a loan from the lending partner, Edpyme Alternativa, in the amount of 3,000 PEN to buy balance feed for her animals and, secondly, to buy more animals to offer to her customers.

loans.use: to buy balanced feed for her animals.

loans.name: Basilia

texts.es:
Basilia se dedica al negocio de venta verduras, ella vende verduras, la socia vende tomates,zanahorias,pepinos y zapallos, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el  sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de venta de verduras. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar tomates, zapallos y pepinos.


 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota .
texts.en:
Basilia has a business where she sells vegetables such as tomatoes, carrots, cucumbers, and squash. She works from 8:00 A.M. to 6:00 P.M. Basilia has been in this business for several years and is doing very well. Her dream is to expand her business of selling vegetables. She is requesting a loan in order to buy tomatoes, squash, and cucumbers.

Basilia is pleased with the loan and promises to complete her payments.

loans.use: to buy tomatoes, squash, and cucumbers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more fashion clothing (blouses, T-shirts, and dresses) to increase her sales.

loans.name: Anarkul

texts.ru: Анаркуль,57 лет, замужем. Имеет двоих детей. Все члены семьи активно помогают по хозяйству. У Анаркуль средне-техническое образование, с 2011 года занимается животноводством, начав этот бизнес с 30,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду Анаркуль, она смогла развить и расширить свою деятельность до 1 дойной коровы и 5 овец, что приносит ей прибыль в 15,000 сомов (KGS) в месяц. Для содержания скота есть все условия. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Анаркуль обратилась в  Банк "Бай –Тушум" за кредитом на покупку коров, часть кредита потратит на приобретение овец. Доходы от кредита позволят Анаркуль расширить ее бизнес и построить сарай.
texts.en:
Anarkul is a 57-year-old married woman with two children. Everyone in the family actively helps in their business. Anarkul has a high school degree from a vocational school. Since 2011 she has raised livestock, starting her business with 30,000 KGS.

With hard work, Anarkul has been able to grow her business to one dairy cow and five sheep which bring a monthly profit of 15,000 KGS. She has everything she needs to raise cattle. To meet her long-term goals of growing her business, Anarkul is taking a loan from micro-finance organization, Bai-Tushum, to buy cattle and sheep. She will use the profit from the loan to expand her business and build a shed.

loans.use: To buy cows.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more rubber slippers to expand her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase flour, sugar, eggs, and soft drinks for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more fashion clothing (blouses, jeans, trousers, dresses, etc) for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more charcoal for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more pepper, oil, onion, salt, etc., to expand her business.

loans.name: Collins

texts.en:
Collins is a Ghanaian artisan who crafts original jewelry. He would like to purchase raw materials and invest in a hand drill and round file for his workshop.

Collins has been selling through Novica since 2012. This is his story:

"I was born into a family of artists and my father taught me to make jewelry using natural materials such as bone and horn. Right out of school, I joined the family workshop and worked with my father for eight years. I set up my own workshop when I married. I craft each bead by hand and use them in necklaces and bracelets.

"I thank you so much and appreciate the support you are offering me to help my workshop grow."

Use the link below to view Collins's handcrafted beaded jewelry on the Novica site: http://www.novica.com/kiva/8725

loans.use: to purchase raw materials and invest in a hand drill and round file.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more cassava, plantains, potatoes, etc., for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more slippers, Lappa (fabric), copy books, and many items to sell.

loans.name: Flor Bella Vista Group

texts.es: Carmelita es una persona de 41 años de edad (es la que aparece de tercero en la foto de izquierda a derecha, viste blusa de color celeste) vive en el municipio de San Pedro La Laguna, departamento de Sololá, tiene 3 hijos, estudian nivel primario, todos son menores de edad, se dedica a vender comida típica de la región, ya que el lugar donde vive es un lugar muy turístico y es visitado por mucha gente local e internacional, con las ganancia que obtiene sostiene y ayuda a su esposo con los gastos de la familia, ella solicita un crédito para invertir en la compra de utensilios de cocina e insumos para la preparación de comida, ella se dio cuenta de que organizarse en grupo les facilita muchas cosas, con las ganancias Carmelita pretende ayudar a sus hijos para que ellos estudie y se preparen bien académicamente y también mejorar las condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Carmelita is 41 (she is third in the picture from left to right, wearing a light blue blouse) she lives in the San Pedro La Laguna municipality in the department of Sololá. She has 3 children, they are in elementary school and are all underage. 
She sells food typical of the region since the place where she lives is a tourist destination and is visited by a lot of local as well as international people. With the income she earns she supports and helps her husband with the family expenses. 
She is applying for a loan to invest in the purchase of kitchen utensils and materials for food production. She realized that organizing themselves as a group really facilitates things. 
With her earnings, Carmelita aims to help her children to study and prepare themselves academically and also improve the quality of life.

loans.use: purchase materials for food production

loans.name: Mujeres Emprendedoras De Primavera Group

texts.es:
Mujeres Emprendedoras de Primavera es un grupo formado en la ciudad de Luque, que está integrado por 15 mujeres muy trabajadoras y por sobre todo emprendedoras.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Eloisa, quien  forma parte del programa de eliminación de la pobreza, la cual en su primera encuesta mostró un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel 1, donde ella a través del esfuerzo y el trabajo continuo y la aplicaciones de los comportamientos vitales de una mujer exitosa, ella se encuentra mejorando su situación de pobreza.
Ella es peluquera, y cuenta que pide este préstamo en compra de accesorios y artículos de Peluquería, y que le permitirá poder emprender esta actividad. Está muy agradecida por la oportunidad de progreso que está recibiendo, y que le permitirá seguir creciendo.
texts.en:
Mujeres Emprendedoras de Primavera [Entrepreneurial Women of Spring] is a group created in the city of of Luque that is made up of 15 very hard-working and above all entrepreneurial women.

One of the members is Eloisa, who is part of the poverty elimination program. In her first survey, she demonstrated a Level 1 poverty level. Through effort and continuous work and the application of the essential behaviors of a successful woman, she is improving her poverty situation.

She is a hairdresser and says that she is asking for this loan to buy accessories and hair salon items and that it will allow her to be able to perform this activity. She is very grateful for the opportunity for progress that she is receiving and that it will allow her to continue growing.

loans.use: to buy accessories and hair salon items

loans.name: Damas Trabajadoras Group

texts.es:
Damas Trabajadoras está en su ciclo número 11 del programa de comités de mujeres, ellas forman parte del programa de eliminación de la pobreza,  donde a través de la encuesta de eliminación de la pobreza podrán conocer en qué situación cada una se encuentra.
Una de las integrantes es Sebastiana, que se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras, y por medio de su trabajo lucha por salir adelante y poder dar a su familia todo lo que ella no pudo tener. Es una persona por sobre todo muy sacrificada que con sacrificio y esfuerzo quiere salir adelante.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de frutas y verduras frescas, que le permitirá poder seguir con sus ventas. Agradece por la ayuda que está recibiendo de poder seguir creciendo.
texts.en:
Damas Trabajadoras [Hard-Working Women] is in its 11th cycle of the communal bank program. They are part of the poverty elimination program, where through the poverty elimination survey they will be able to know what situation each one of them is in.

One of the members is Sebastiana, who sells fruit and vegetables, and through her work fights to move ahead and to be able to give her family everything she could not have. She is above all a self-sacrificing person who wants to move ahead with sacrifice and effort.

She is asking for this loan in order to be able to buy fresh fruit and vegetables that will allow her to continue selling. She is thankful for the help that she is receiving to be able to keep growing.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more clothes for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more rubber bowls, cups, plates, etc., for her business.

loans.name: Oksana

texts.ru: Оксане 40 лет, она замужем и имеет 3 детей, дети школьного и дошкольного возраста. У Оксаны среднее образование, работает поваром, также с 2004 года занимается сельским хозяйством. На начальном этапе у Оксаны была только одна корова, но сегодня она имеет в хозяйстве 2 дойные коровы, 20 овец и 25 коз, что что приносит ей прибыль в 10,000 сомов (KGS) в месяц. Скот в летний период Оксана отгоняет на джайлоо, а в зимний содержит в хозяйстве, для чего созданы все условия на территории дома. Супруг и дети активно помогают по хозяйству. В Банк "Бай-Тушум" Оксана обратилась за кредитом на покупку коров. Увеличение поголовья скота позволит улучшить материальное благосостояние семьи, а также дать детям хорошее образование.
texts.en:
Oksana is a 40-year-old married woman with three young children. She has a high school education and works as a cook. In addition, she has been a farmer since 2004. 

In the beginning Oksana had only one cow, but now she has two dairy cows, 20 sheep and 25 goats which bring her 10,000 KGS in monthly profit. In the summer Oksana releases her livestock onto the plains, and during the winter she keeps them at her farm. Her husband and children actively help on the farm. 

She is taking a loan from Bai-Tushum to buy cows. Increasing her herd will improve her family's living conditions and provide her children a good education.

loans.use: To buy cows.

loans.name: Kuña Katupyry Group

texts.es:
El comité Kuña Katupyry está conformado por mujeres luchadoras que trabajan día a día para poder tener sus propios ingresos, son muy sacrificadas y emprendedoras. Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Francisca, que se dedica exclusivamente a la cría de animales, ella comenta que con sus  52 años de edad y con la lucha constante, está saliendo adelante para ayudar a su familia.
Francisca pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de balanceados para sus animales que está criando, como así también para la compra de semillas, ya que también se dedica al cultivo.
Agradece por esta oportunidad de poder seguir creciendo que está recibiendo.
texts.en:
The Kuña Katupyry group is made up of hardworking women who work every day to be able to have their own income.  They make many sacrifices and are very enterprising.  One of the group members is Francisca, who works raising animals.  She says that with her 52 years of age and constant struggles, she is moving forward to help her family.

Francisca is requesting this loan to invest in the purchase of animal feed for animals she is raising, and also to purchase seeds, since she also plants crops.

She is grateful for this opportunity that she is receiving to be able to continue to grow.

loans.use: to purchase animal feed and seeds.

loans.name: Taulaai

texts.en:
Taulaai is a 46-year-old woman. She is married with five children. 

She has a small garden where she grows taro, cabbages, cucumbers, and bananas that she can sell in her community or at the market. She has been doing this for three years.

Taulaai needs a loan to buy chemicals, fertilizer, a wheelbarrow, tarpaulin and bush knives. Taulaai will use the profits from her sales to support her family and to renovate her house.

loans.use: to buy chemicals, fertilizer, a wheelbarrow, tarpaulin, and bush knives.

loans.name: Asylzhan

texts.ru: Асылжан 61 год, замужем, мать 4 детей. Супруг помогает по хозяйству. Живут одной большой дружной семьей. Каждый член семьи пытается внести свой вклад в развитие благоустройства своей семьи. Сама Асылжан по характеру очень трудолювая, ответственная и целеустремленная. У Асылжан - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи она с 1977 года занимается животноводством, стартовав с покупки одной коровы. Благодаря упорному труду Асылжан, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 2 дойные коровы и 12 овец. Ежедневно Асылжан реализует молоко и молочную продукцию. Ежемесячный доход составляет 24,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Асылжан обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом - на покупку бычков для откорма с последующей реализацией на рынке по высокой цене. Доходы от кредита Асылжан планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, а также в будущем намерена сделать ремонт дома.
texts.en:
Asylzhan is a 61-year-old married woman with four children. Her husband helps on the farm. They live as one big happy family, each trying to do their part to improve the family's living conditions. 

Asylzhan herself is very hardworking, responsible and purposeful. She has a high school education. Her family's main source of income since 1977 has come from raising livestock. She started with one cow, and through her hard work, now has two diary cows and 12 sheep. She sells milk and dairy products every day. Her monthly income is 24,000 KGS. 

To meet her long-term goals of growing her business, Asylzhan took a loan from Bai-Tushum to buy calves to fatten and eventually sell at the market for a high price. She plans to use the income from the loan to buy more livestock in the future and repair her house.

loans.use: To buy steer.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To acquire a variety of paints and construction supplies.

loans.name: Liliana Patricia

texts.es:
Liliana, a sus 44 años de edad, se caracteriza por ser una mujer carismática, ordenada y trabajadora, vive con su esposo y sus dos hijos adolescentes, quienes son su mayor motivación para luchar incansablemente.
Desde hace 6 años comenzó a trabajar como comerciante independiente, vendiendo mercancía por catálogo, oficio que aprendió de una amiga que se dedica a la misma labor. Trabaja todos los días y tiene la ventaja de ser reconocida por su amabilidad y trayectoria.
El crédito solicitado lo invertirá en la compra de surtido al por mayor (cosméticos, perfumería, accesorios), esto le permitirá obtener los productos con descuento, para dar un mejor precio a sus clientes y así aumentar las ventas, mientras satisface los gustos diversos de los compradores.
Liliana manifiesta que su mayor sueño es fortalecer su negocio y ser una líder de zona, que le mejore la rentabilidad y los ingresos para así dar una mejor educación a sus hijos y disfrutar una mejor calidad de vida en compañía de sus seres amados.
texts.en:
Liliana, at the age of 44, is known as a charismatic, organized, and hard-working woman. She lives with her husband and their two adolescent children, who are her great motivation for striving untiringly.

Six years ago she began to work as an independent businesswoman, selling catalog merchandise, a business that she learned from a friend who does the same work. She works every day and has the advantage of being recognized for her friendliness and experience.

She will invest the loan she has applied for in the purchase of wholesale stock (cosmetics, perfumes, and accessories). This will allow her to obtain the products at a discount, in order to give a better price to her customers, and thus to increase sales, while she satisfies the diverse tastes of the buyers.

Liliana states that her great dream is to strengthen her business and be a leader in the zone, which will improve its profitability and income to thus give a better education to her children and enjoy a better quality of life in the company of her loved ones.

loans.use: to buy wholesale stock (cosmetics, perfumes, accessories)

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more salt, rice, fish, meat, pepper, onions, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Julián

texts.es: Julián tiene 42 años, vive con su pareja y tienen dos menores de edad. Desde muy joven ha trabajado con su papá en una carnicería, aprendió el oficio y con su experiencia decidió poner su propio negocio en el barrio donde vive para poder tener el sustento para su familia, Julián sueña con tener un local propio y adquirir surtido para su carnicería, solicitó el préstamo con el fin de invertir en compra de carne tanto de cerdo como de res, al por mayor, lo que le representa mayores ganancias y teniendo producto de buena calidad para brindarle a su clientela quien le compra desde que inició su negocio, esto le representa un mejor nivel de vida y bienestar para toda su familia.
texts.en: Julián is 42 years old. He lives with his partner and they have two minor children. Since he was very young, he has worked with his father in a butcher shop. He learned the work and with his experience he decided to open his own business in the neighborhood where he lives in order to be able to support his family. Julián dreams of having suitable premises and acquiring supplies for his butcher shop. He asked for the loan with the goal of buying wholesale meat, pork as well as beef, which means greater earnings for him as well as having a good-quality product to provide his customers, who have bought from him since he started the business. This means a better standard of living and well-being for his whole family.

loans.use: to buy meat, pork as well as beef

loans.name: Pueata

texts.en:
Pueata is 46 years old and married with four children. She has a small garden where she grows pineapples, taro, and taamu that she can sell in her community or at the market. She has been doing this for two years.

Pueata needs a loan to buy chemicals, a backpack sprayer, tarpaulin, empty water gallon, and bush knives. 

She has been a member of SPBD since 2013. Pueata will use the profits from her sales to support her family.

loans.use: to buy chemicals, a backpack sprayer, tarpaulin, empty water gallon, and bush knives.

loans.name: Marcia

texts.es:
Sra. Marcia es de la ciudad de Carapeguá, tiene  45 años, está casada hace más de 10 años con el Sr. Fermín de 53 años de edad, tienen 2  hijos, por quienes esta pareja está luchando para sacarlos adelante.
Ella empezó con un pequeño negocio donde vendía todo tipo de ropa deportiva ya que su marido se dedicaba como director técnico deportivo, así de apoco lograron juntar más capital y ampliaron su negocio con una despensa bien surtida ya que en la zona cercana no hay una.   
Ahora desea comprar más productos,  como ser: bebidas y artículos de primera necesidad como: Harina, yerba, fideos  arroz y otros,  para ello solicita el préstamo. Agradece por esta oportunidad que está recibiendo de poder crecer.
texts.en:
Señora Marcia is from the city of Carapeguá. She is 45 and has been married for more than 10 years to Señor Fermin, who is 53. They have two children, whom this couple is working hard to raise.

She began with a little business where she sold all types of sports clothing, since her husband worked as technical sports director, thus they slowly managed to put together more capital and expand her business with a well stocked grocery store, since there wasn't one in the nearby zone.

Now she wants to buy more products, such as beverages and articles of basis need, such as flour, yerba, pasta, rice, and other items. For this, she is applying for the loan. She is grateful for this opportunity that she is receiving to be able to grow.

loans.use: to buy products of basic need, such as flour, yerba, pasta, rice, and others.

loans.name: Esperanza 2 Group

texts.es:
El grupo Esperanza 2 está en su ciclo número 1º  del programa de comité de mujeres, es un grupo nuevo que ve una gran oportunidad de progreso por medio de las capacitaciones que está recibiendo, y también a través de la encuesta de eliminación de la pobreza.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Francisca, ella es  ama de casa y se dedica a la elaboración y venta de comidas y a la vez cada fin de semana realiza venta de asaditos para mejorar su nivel de pobreza y también para poder ayudar a su familia.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de insumos para seguir haciendo sus comidas, como ser carne, condimentos, panificados, mandiocas y demás. Agradece por esta oportunidad de poder seguir mejorando sus condiciones de vida y sus ingresos.
texts.en:
The Esperanza 2 group is in its 1st cycle of the communal bank program. It is a new group that sees a great opportunity for progress via the trainings it is receiving and also through the poverty elimination survey.

One of the members is Francisca. She is a housewife and she makes and sells food. At the same time, every weekend she sells barbecue in order to improve her poverty level and also to be able to help her family.

She is asking for this loan in order to be able to buy supplies to continue making her food, such as meat, condiments, bread products, manioc, and others. She is thankful for this opportunity to be able to continue improving her living conditions and her income.

loans.use: to buy supplies to make food, such as meat, condiments, bread products, manioc, and other supplies

loans.name: Cristo Rey Group

texts.es:
Cristo Rey es un grupo formado en la ciudad de San Ignacio, son 17 mujeres muy trabajadoras y por sobre todo emprendedora, que con mucho sacrificio y esfuerzo está saliendo adelante para que, por medio del trabajo en equipo puedan ayudarse las unas a las otras.
La Sra. Benita, es profesora y además realiza venta de prendas de vestir, ella vive con su hija en casa propia y lucha siempre por brindar lo mejor a su familia. Su hija es su inspiración, ya que quiere poder ayudarla, y darle todo lo que no pudo tener, es una persona muy sacrificada que lucha por salir adelante.
La Sra. Solicita  este préstamo para invertir en prendas varias, para la venta ambulante en sus días que no está enseñando, ya que le permitirá poder seguir creciendo.
texts.en:
Cristo Rey is a group formed in the city of San Ignacio.  It is made up of 17 hardworking and enterprising women, who with a lot of sacrifice and effort are moving forward so that they can help each other with their work as a team.

Benita is a teaching and also sells clothing.  She lives with her daughter in the home she owns and always fights to provide the best for her family.  Her daughter is her inspiration since she wants to be able to help her and give her everything that she was not able to have.  She has made many sacrifices to move forward.

Benita is requesting this loan to invest in a variety of clothing items that she will sell on the streets on days she is not teaching.  This will allow her to continue growing.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of clothing to sell.

loans.name: Pyapy Mbarete Group

texts.es:
Pyapy Mbarete está integrado por 18 mujeres que están en su 3er. Ciclo, cada una está poniendo su mejor esfuerzo para poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida y las de su familia. Se unieron en grupo, ya que han visto una gran oportunidad de crecimiento para ellas y sus familias.
Yeymi es una de las integrantes, quien se dedica al reciclado de productos variados, como cartón, papel, aluminio, y demás productos que ella misma junta y que luego vende, teniendo de esa forma tiene los ingresos para ayudar a sus familiares. Yeymi dice que está orgullosa de lo que hace, ya que es un trabajo digno y por sobre todo honrado.
Pide este préstamo para la compra de aluminio, cartones, y demás, que podrá revender y de esa forma tener un margen de ganancias para poder ayudar a su familia. Agradece por la oportunidad que está recibiendo de poder seguir creciendo.
texts.en:
Pyapy Mbarete is made up of 18 women who are in their 3rd loan cycle.  Each one of them is putting in their best effort to improve their living conditions and those of their families.  They created their group since their saw a great growth opportunity for them and their families.

Yeymi is one of the group members.  She works recycling various products, including cardboard, paper, aluminum, and other products that she collects and later sells.  This work provides income to help her relatives.  Yeymi says that she is proud of the work she does since it is respectable and honest work.

She is requesting this loan to purchase aluminum, cardboard, and other items to resell and have a profit margin to be able to help her family.  She is grateful for the opportunity she is receiving to be able to continue growing.

loans.use: to purchase aluminum, cardboard, and other items for resale.

loans.name: Kolaban Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe Kolaban est composé des femmes mariées vivant avec leurs maris et leurs enfants dans des familles traditionnelles. Elles ont en moyenne 58ans et 5 enfants. Elles habitent toutes dans le village de Kalaban Coro chef lieu de commune dans le cercle de Kati (dans la 2ème région administrative du Mali)  et se sont connues à travers des liens de parenté, de voisinage et d’amitié. Les membres du groupe font le petit commerce d’habits (pagnes wax) de meilleures qualités, de mèches, du charbon de bois, du jus et de la restauration. Dans le but d’augmenter leurs fonds de commerce, les membres du groupe ont décidé de collaborer avec Soro Yiriwaso et sont à leur 1er cycle de prêt solidaire.
Madame Bintou (femme assise à l’extrême gauche sur la photo) a une réputation dans la vente des habits (pagnes wax) de meilleures qualités. Elle compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter 22 pièces de pagnes wax à  Bamako. La revente se fait en détail au marché et en ambulant à une clientèle constituée majoritairement de femmes. Madame Bintou espère réaliser avec ce prêt un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 40 000 FCFA qui sera utilisé, pour être réinjecté dans l’activité et subvenir aux petits besoins des enfants.
texts.en:
The group Kolaban is composed of married women living with their husband and children in traditional families. The women average 58 years of age and five children each, all living in the village of Kalaban Coro, the seat of the Commune, in Cercle de Kati (2nd administrative region of the Republic of Mali). The group members know one another through ties of kinship, community, and friendship, and they do small-scale commerce in Wax ’pagnes’ (the colorful cloth of western Africa) of the best quality, hair extensions, charcoal, and juice drinks, and they work in food service.

With the goal of increasing their business capital, the group members decided to collaborate with the the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso and are now on their first solidarity loan cycle. 

Ms. Bintou (the woman sitting at the far left in the photo) is known for selling cloth (Wax ‘pagne’) of the best qualities. She intends to use her loan to purchase 22 lengths of Wax ‘pagne’ in Bamako. The sales are made retail to a customer base composed mostly of women at the market and by going door to door. 

With this loan, Ms. Bintou is planning on an average monthly profit of 40,000 francs CFA that will be used for reinvesting in her business and meeting the various needs of the children.

loans.use: to purchase Wax 'pagne' cloth

loans.name: Seydina Issa

texts.fr: SEYDINA est un jeune homme âgé de 28 ans et qui professeur de arabe de profession dans un collège de la place.  Il est célibataire qui n’a pas d’enfant et vit avec ses parents. Il a comme charges particulières ses besoins personnels et ceux de ses parents. Il demande ce prêt d’un montant de 150.000F pour acheter des cartes de crédit qu’il revend à ses collègues et ses clients. Il a une expérience de plus de 2 ans dans cette activité. Il commence sa journée à 8h pour la terminer  12h. Il veut avoir sa propre boutique  pour mieux gérer ses activités et satisfaire d’avantage les besoins de ses clients.
texts.en: SEYDINA is a young man, 28 years old, who is a teacher of Arabic by profession at a local middle school. He is unmarried and has no children. He lives with his parents. His expenses in particular include those for supporting himself and his parents. He is asking for this loan in the amount of 150,000 francs to purchase phone minutes cards that he resells to his colleagues and customers. He has over two years of experience in this business. His day starts at 8 AM and ends at noon. He wants to have his own store for managing his business better and satisfying further the needs of his customers.

loans.use: to purchase phone minutes to resell

loans.name: Muaimalae

texts.en: Muaimalae is 46 years old, married and the mother of five children. She has a small farm where she earns a living by growing cabbage, green onions, tomatoes, green peppers and carrots. She has been doing this for three years and is requesting a loan to buy supplies, including fertilizer, a rake, a garden hose, barbed wire, a spade and gloves. She has been a member of SPBD since 2010 and plans to use her profits to expand her business and pay for the education of her children.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies.

loans.name: 04 Đông Hải Group

texts.en: Mrs. Lâm works as a farmer and is requesting a loan to buy fertilizer to use to grow rice. She is 47 years old, married, the mother of three children and leads a loan group called 02.01.04 Đông Hải solidarity, which has three members. Lâm lives in Thanh Hoa city, an urban area in Thanh Hoa province. In 2008, she joined the fund to improve her  business. Lâm has successfully repaid six previous loans, and has been involved in her current line of work for five years. One of her main problems is a lack of capital. In the future, she hopes that her family will be healthy and happy, her business will do well, and her children will find good jobs.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer to grow rice.

loans.name: Eulalio

texts.es:
El señor Eulalio tiene 41 años, tiene 2 hijos en edad escolar, está acompañado con la Sra. Lorena, ellos viven en la ciudad de Itá, es una pareja bastante luchadora que está esforzándose por darle a sus hijos una vida digna.
Don Eulalio se dedica a prestar servicio de electricista de automóviles, ya hace como 9 años, para lo cual tiene montado su propio taller en el centro de la ciudad. Esto le ha ayudado a ir mejorando su vida y mejorar cada día sus condiciones de vida.
