El préstamo que pide es para construir una casilla para iniciar una venta de insumos de primera necesidad para el hogar, en lo cual se encargara su esposa en administrar dicho futuro negocio. Eulalio lucha día a día para llevar el pan de cada día a su familia que gracias al esfuerzo y la dedicación que pone de su parte van sobre saliendo día a día y ve creciendo a sus hijos con una buena educación inculcada mediante ellos.
texts.en:
Señor Eulalio is 41 years old. He has two children of school age. His partner is Señora Lorena. They live in the city of Itá. They are a hard-working couple who are striving to give their children a dignified life.

For nine years, Don Eulalio has been doing electric service on automobiles. For this, he has set up his own workshop in the center of the city.
This has helped him to continually improve his life and every day improve his living conditions.

The loan that he is applying for is to construct a stand to begin selling basic household necessities, where his wife would be in charge of managing this future business. Eulalio strives every day to bring daily sustenance to his family, which, thanks to the effort and dedication that he puts forth on his part, continues to excel every day, and he sees their children growing with a good education instilled by them.

loans.use: to construct a stand for selling basic household products

loans.name: Aitasi

texts.en: Aitasi is a 25-year-old married woman with one child. She plans to expand her business where she sells tin fish, powder, flour, sugar, salt, ice cream, ice pop, chicken legs, etc. She requested a loan to buy boxes of chicken, noodles, sugar, salt, laundry powder, mosquito coils, toilet rolls and soap. Aitasi will use her profits to help with her family matters and to pay for her child's education. Aitasi joined SPBD in 2014 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy boxes of chicken, noodles, sugar, salt, laundry powder, mosquito coils, toilet rolls and soap.

loans.name: Nuevo Amanecer Group

texts.es:
El grupo Nuevo Amanecer está en su cuarto ciclo del programa de comité de mujeres, ellas están luchando por sus familias, para poder darles todo lo que ellas no pudieron tener.
Una de ellas es la Sra. Magdalena, quien tiene una despensa, que con mucho sacrificio y esfuerzo ha montado. Cuenta que al principio le ha costado bastante, pero que fue haciéndose camino gracias al sacrificio y esfuerzo, y también gracias a que quiere ayudar a su familia por medio de su trabajo.
La Sra. Magdalena solicita este préstamo para la compra de insumos varios para la venta en su despensa, como ser comestibles, bebidas, verduras, y demás, con lo que podrá seguir con sus ventas, y luchando por mejorar sus ingresos. Todas las integrantes están muy agradecidas por la oportunidad que están recibiendo de seguir luchando.
texts.en:
The Nuevo Amanecer group is in their fourth loan cycle with the women's committee.  They are fighting for their families, to be able to give them everything that they were not able to have.  

One of the members is Magdalena.  She has a general store, which she opened with a lot of sacrifice and effort.  She says that at the beginning, it had cost her a lot, but she continued on her path with sacrifice and effort.  She also wanted to help her family with her work.

Magdalena is requesting this loan to purchase merchandise to sell at her store, including groceries, drinks, vegetables, and other items so that she can continue with her sales and improve her profits.  

All of the group members are grateful for the opportunity they are receiving to continue fighting.

loans.use: to purchase groceries, drinks, vegetables, and other items for sale.

loans.name: Ramila

texts.ru: Рамила, 55 лет, разведена, 3 детей. Дети активно помогают по хозяйству. У Рамилы- среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи она занимается животноводством и полеводством, стартовав в 1994 году с 10,000 сом (KGS), благодаря целеустремленности и трудолюбию Рамилы, на сегодняшний день у нее есть: 2 дойные коровы и 1 лошадь. Также имеется 0,82 ГА земельной доли, на которой она ежегодно выращивает картофель и пшеницу для внутрихозяйственного потребления и реализации. Дополнительно Рамила реализует молоко. Ежемесячный совокупный доход составляет около 20,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Рамила обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом для закупки коров, часть средств она потратит на весенне-полевые работы. Рамила намерена увеличить поголовье скота и получить хороший урожай со своего участка, что непременно приведет к увеличению капитала семьи. Доходы от кредита Рамила планирует вложить в ремонт дома.
texts.en: Ramila is a 55 year old divorced mother of three. The children actively help her on the farm. Ramila, having a high school education, is the main breadwinner for her family, engaging in raising livestock and farming, which she began in 1994 with 10,000 som (KGS), and thanks to the hard work of Ramila, today she has two diary cows and one horse. Also she has a 0.82 hectare land stake which at this time she is growing potatoes and wheat for non-farm consumption. Additionally Ramila sells milk. Her monthly total income is about 20,000 som (KGS). In order to develop her farm, Ramila asked the bank "Bai-Tushum" for a loan to purchase cows, with part of the money spent on spring field work. Ramila intends to increase her number of cattle and have a good harvest, which will inevitably lead to an increase in her family's capital. With income she makes off the loan, Ramila plans to make repairs on her home.

loans.use: To buy cows

loans.name: Lam

texts.en: Mrs. Lam is 38 years old, married, the mother of two children, and earns a living by raising poultry and cattle. She lives with her family in the Nong Cong district, a rural part in Thanh Hoa province. She is requesting her first loan from the Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women. She has been in her current line of work for more than 10 years, but faces difficulties because she does not have a hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to buy sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet and bathroom. With the money she earns from her business, Lam hopes to provide for her children, help them do well in school, and ensure that her family is healthy and happy.

loans.use: to buy building supplies.

loans.name: Hương

texts.en: Mrs. Hương works in agriculture, farming poultry and cattle. Hương is 34 years old and she is married with three children. She lives and works in Nong Cong district, a rural area in Thanh Hoa province, with three dependents. This is Hương’s first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women.  She has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. The main hardship that Hương faces in her life is not having a hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, and bricks to build a toilet and bathroom. With her business profits, Hương hopes to make enough money to provide for her kids, for her family to be healthy and happy, and to build a new house.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, and bricks to build a  toilet and bathroom.

loans.name: Nurisa

texts.ru: Нуриса, 45 лет, замужем, 2 детей. В качестве основного дохода для своей семьи она с 2005 года занимается животноводством и полеводством.  Нуриса знает, как правильно использовать и планировать денежные средства для достижения поставленных целей. Благодаря упорному труду в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется 15 овец. Для содержания скота есть все условия: сарай и отгонные пастбища. Также есть земельный надел размером 2 ГА, где Нуриса выращивает фасоль для собственного потребления и реализации. Ежемесячный доход составляет 10,000 сомов (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Нуриса обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум"  за кредитом на покупку овец для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита она планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на ремонт дома.
texts.en:
Nurisa is 45 years old, married, and has two children. As a main source of income for her family, she has been involved since 2005 in raising livestock and crops. Nurisa knows how to properly use and plan her monetary resources to achieve goals. Thanks to her hard work, her homestead now has 15 sheep. She has all the conditions to care for livestock: a barn and remote pastures. She also has a plot of land measuring two hectares, where Nurisa grows beans for home consumption and for sale. Monthly income amounts to 10,000 som (KGS).

With the aim of further developing her homestead, Nurisa applied to Bai-Tushum Bank for a loan to purchase sheep for increasing her livestock count. She plans to invest income from the loan in further propagating the quantity of livestock, and plans to save money for home repairs.

loans.use: to buy sheep

loans.name: Marvie

texts.en: Marvie is 42 years old, married and lives with her family. She earns a living by raising pigs, and also helps her husband with their crops and other livestock. She says that her pig-raising business is doing well, and she would like to buy a sow to keep until it gives birth to piglets. Marvie's ambition is to grow her business and keep working as hard as she has in the past.

loans.use: buying a female pig to keep until it gives birth to piglets.

loans.name: Zhyldyzkan

texts.ru: Жылдызкан 46 лет, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 2 детей. У Жылдызкан - среднее образование. Животноводством и полеводством она стала заниматься с 2004 года, приобретя 1 корову. Вместе с мужем Жылдызкан  выращивает картофель на своем приусадебном участке, мерою 1,48 ГА, для собственного потребления и реализации. Ежемесячный доход составляет около 10,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Жылдызкан обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом для покупки овец, часть средств будет потрачено на весенне-полевые работы. Увеличение поголовья скота даст возможность увеличить капитал семьи. Доходы от кредита Жылдызкан планирует вложить в приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на постройку сарая для скота.
texts.en:
Zhyldyzkan is 46 years old, married, and together with her husband is raising two children. Zhyldyzkan has a secondary education. She became involved in raising livestock and crops in 2004, having acquired one cow. Together with her husband, Zhyldyzkan grows potatoes on their own garden plot measuring 1.48 hectares, for their own consumption and for sale. Monthly income amounts to about 10,000 som (KGS).

With the aim of further developing her homestead, Zhyldyzkan turned to Bai-Tushum Bank for a loan to purchase sheep, part of the funds will be used to do the spring field preparation. Increased livestock count will bring the opportunity to increase the family's capital.

Zhyldyzkan plans to invest income from the loan in further propagating the quantity of domestic animals, and plans to save money for building a barn for the livestock.

loans.use: to buy sheep

loans.name: Etini

texts.en:
Etini is 29 years old and a partner woman with 5 children. She makes and sells elei lavalava to earn a living and has been doing this for 2 years. 

Etini has requested a loan to buy colored fabric paints, materials, brushes, stencils and elei carved board for her printing. She plans to use her profits to improve her business. She joined SPBD in 2014 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy colored fabric paints, materials, brushes, stencils and elei carved board

loans.name: Jovenes Unidos En Cristo Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Jovenes Unidos en Cristo, tiene 10 integrantes, son jóvenes que decidieron tomar la iniciativa para poder ayudar a sus familias por medio de su esfuerzo y su trabajo. Ellos quieren sentirse útiles y poder ayudar a sus seres queridos de alguna forma.
Alisson es parte de este grupo, ella es una joven que está empezando a trabajar para así poder tener un poco de ingresos para ayudar a su familia de alguna forma. Ella vende joyas sobre pedido, y así está mejorando o luchando por mejorar y ayudar a sus seres queridos.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de joyas variadas para la venta, ya que de esa forma podrá seguir luchando por mejorar su vida, y así salir adelante. Agradecen todos por la oportunidad que están recibiendo.
texts.en:
The Jovenes Unidos en Cristo group has 10 members.  They are young people who decided to take the initiative to be able to help their families with their effort and work.  They want to feel useful and be able to help their loved ones somehow.

Alisson is part of the group.  She is a young person who is started to work so that she can have some income to help her family.  She sells jewelry by order and is improving or fighting to improve and help her loved ones.  

She is requesting this loan to invest in the purchase of a variety of jewelry for sale since this is the way she can continue fighting to improve her life and succeed.  She is grateful to everyone for the opportunity she is receiving.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of jewelry for sale.

loans.name: Dũng

texts.en:
Dũng has a retail business selling metals. She has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.  Dũng is 43 years old and she is married with two children. She lives and works in Thieu Hoa district, a  rural area in Thanh Hoa province, with one dependent.

The main hardship that Dũng faces in her life is not having a clean water system and a hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, and bricks to build a toilet and bathroom.

In 2010, Dũng joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. Dũng has successfully repaid one loan from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. With her business profit, Dũng hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, to remodel her house, and to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, and bricks to build a toilet and bathroom

loans.name: Duyến

texts.en:
Mrs. Duyến works in agriculture, farming poultry and cattle. Duyến is 59 years old and she is married with three children. She lives and works in Hoang Hoa district, a rural area in Thanh Hoa province, with no dependents. In 2010, Duyến joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. She has successfully repaid one loan from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Duyến has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. One of the most critical difficulties that concerns her, is not having a water tank and a water filter. She is requesting a loan to buy a water tank and a clean water filter.

With her business profits, Duyến hopes to buy land of her own, to maintain a successful business, and to remodel her house.

loans.use: to buy a water tank and a clean water filter.

loans.name: Cecilio

texts.es:
Cecilio viene de una familia muy humilde y comenta que su meta es ser una profesional en la carrera que está cursando que es la contabilidad.
Él es una persona muy trabajadora que lucha por salir adelante, y ayudar a su familia por medio de la carrera que ha elegido. Quiere ser un profesional útil para la sociedad.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en pagar sus cuotas, y de esa forma poder seguir con sus estudios. Agradece por la oportunidad que está recibiendo de poder seguir estudiando como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Cecilio comes from a very poor family and says that his goal is to be a professional in the career that he is pursuing, accounting.
He is a very hardworking person and struggles to get ahead in life and help his family by way of the career he has selected. He wants to be a skilled professional for society.
He requests this loan to be able to invest it in his University fees and in this way be able to continue with his studies. He is grateful for the opportunity that he is receiving to be able to continue studying as he was.

loans.use: to pay university payments.

loans.name: Cẩn

texts.en:
Cẩn is 59 years old and married with three children. She lives with no dependents in Nong Cong district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province. She works in agriculture. Cẩn has been involved in her business for more than 10 years. This is Cẩn's first loan with the Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women. The main hardship she faces in her life is not having a hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet and bathroom.
With her business profits, Cẩn hopes to maintain a successful business and that her children can find good jobs.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet and bathroom.

loans.name: Lorena

texts.en:
Lorena is 36 years old, married, and has three children. Lorena lives in Manga, Tangub City, Philippines.
Lorena is a farmer and grows coconuts to earn a living. She has been doing this for 14 years. She has requested a loan to pay for coconuts for her buy and sell business. 
Lorena has been a member of PMPC for nine months. In the future, Lorena hopes to own farmland.

loans.use: to pay for coconuts for her buy and sell business

loans.name: Estrella

texts.en: Estrella is a hardworking woman from Maggasi. She lives together with her husband and five children. She is engaged in pig breeding. She currently keeps one mother pig and five piglets. Near the house where Estrella and her family live, they also own a plot of arable land where wheat and some grass is cultivated. Although in Estrella’s family, she is not the only person employed, agribusiness is the main income that sustains the family. Now, Estrella asks for this loan of PHP 10,000 to purchase three piglets and forage for the livestock.

loans.use: to purchase three piglets and forage for the livestock.

loans.name: Jennalyn

texts.en:
Jenalyn, 40, is a married woman who lives in her own home with her children. She describes herself as an honest, hardworking, and above all, a hard-working woman. Fifteen years ago she succeeded in setting up a small grocery store at her home and thanks to God and through her hard work and dedication the business has become well-known in the area, hence she has a lot of customers. 

For Jenalyn, it is very important to keep this business alive as this is her main source of income. What is the most important for her are her customers as she knows that by keeping them satisfied with the service that she is offering, they will continue to choose her and her store will continue to be in business just as she dreams. It is for this reason that Jenalyn has decided to seek this loan from ASKI to invest in the purchase of merchandise for the store such as eggs, sweets, sugar, rice, milk, beans, sweet bread, and other items which are of interest to her customers. 

In this manner, Jenalyn hopes to make her dream a reality, keeping her business alive and continuing to work for the betterment of her family.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise for her store such as eggs, sweets, sugar, rice, milk, beans, sweet bread, and other items which are of interest to her customers.

loans.name: Tazagul

texts.ru: Тазагуль 30 лет, замужем. Совместно с супругом воспитывают 3 детей. В 2011 году, начала бизнес в торговле женскими вещами, используя в качестве стартового капитала сумму в 45,000 сом (KGS). Сумев развить свой бизнес и обретя постоянных клиентов, Тазагуль имеет среднемесячный доход в сумме 15,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду в бизнесе, она смогла приобрести для своей семьи автомобиль. В целях дальнейшего увеличения и расширения своего бизнеса, Тазагуль обратилась в Банк «Бай-Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом на увеличение товарооборота на весенне-летний сезон, она хочет приобрести женские вечерние платья и туфли для дальнейшей перепродажи. Доходы от кредита она планирует вложить в постройку собственного магазина.
texts.en:
Tazagul is 30 years old and married. Together with her husband, she is raising three children. In 2011, she began a business selling women's articles, using as starting capital a sum of 45,000 som (KGS). Having managed to develop her own business and to attract regular customers, Tazagul has an average monthly income of 15,000 som (KGS). Thanks to her hard work in the business, she was able to acquire an automobile for her family.

With the aim of further expanding and improving her business, Tazagul turned to Bai-Tushum Bank for a loan to expand her inventory for the spring-summer season. She wants to acquire women's evening gowns and shoes for future resale.

She plans to invest income from the loan in building her own store.

loans.use: to sell clothes

loans.name: Cayetana

texts.en:
Cayetana is from Sindangan, Zamboanga del Norte, Philippines. She is 43 years old and is married with eight children. 

In 2008, Cayetana applied for membership with PMPC. Hearing all the benefits, she never hesitated to become a member. She maintains the status of being a member in good standing and repays her obligations in a timely manner.

Recently, Cayetana asked for financial assistance of PHP 5,000 to  buy more stock for her sari-sari (convenience) store. She will restock her store with basic commodities like rice, canned goods, noodles, and soap. Through this loan, she hopes to increase her income and expand her business.  She appreciates the financial assistance from Paglaum Multi Purpose Cooperative and she is very thankful with all her heart.

loans.use: to buy more stock for her sari-sari store

loans.name: Rosaria

texts.en: Rosaria is married and has seven children. She has a second-hand shop where many people come to buy every day. Using her $1,500 loan, Rosaria will improve her business by buying additional supplies such as long shorts, short sleeve shirts, and long sleeve shirts. She has been involving herself in business activities since 2013. She feels comfortable running her business because she can earn money every day. Running a business has made Rosaria independent because she can be responsible for herself and also help her family. She hopes to run a bigger business in the future.

loans.use: to buy long shorts, short sleeve shirts, and long sleeve shirts to sell in her second-hand shop.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy clothing and handbags

loans.name: Christian

texts.es:
Christian es un muchacho que trabaja todos los días en horario del día, y estudia por las noches, y de esa forma espera poder ser alguien en la vida, y ayudar a su familia.
Cuenta que viene de una familia muy humilde y trabajadora, que le ha enseñado a luchar por lo que quiere. Comenta que su mayor gasto es llegar a la facultad, ya que está muy lejos, es por eso que pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en sus gastos de transporte, y de esa forma poder seguir estudiando como lo viene haciendo. Agradece por la oportunidad que está recibiendo de seguir sus estudios.
texts.en:
Christian is a young man who works every day and studies at night. He hopes to make something of himself and to help his family. He comes from a very humble and hardworking family, who taught him to fight for what he wants. He says that their biggest expense is getting to school because it is far away.

This is why he is requesting this loan to invest in his transportation costs, and thus be able to continue studying as he currently does. He is grateful for the opportunity to continue his studies.

loans.use: to cover transportation costs.

loans.name: Nilsa

texts.es:
Nilsa es estudiante universitaria, está cursando el tercer año de la Carrera Psicología Educacional, donde comenta que también trabaja para poder solventar los gastos de la facultad y ayudarle a sus padres.
Nilsa es una persona muy responsable, honesta y trabajadora estudia y trabaja para salir adelante, vive con sus padres es muy dedicada a sus estudios. Su sueño es terminar su carrera y el día de mañana trabajar de forma independiente y enseñar en las Universidades.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en sus gastos de titulación, y de esa forma poder seguir con sus estudios. Agradece por la oportunidad que está recibiendo de poder seguir con sus estudios.
texts.en:
Nilsa is a university student. She is in the third year of the Educational Psychology program. She notes that she also works in order to be able to cover the cost of tuition and to help her parents.

Nilsa is a very responsible, honest, and hard-working person. She studies and works in order to move forward. She lives with her parents and is very dedicated to her studies. Her dream is to finish her program and, in the future, to work independently and teach in the universities.

She is asking for this loan in order to be able to use it for her degree expenses, and in this way be able to continue with her studies. She is thankful for the opportunity she is receiving to be able to continue with her studies.

loans.use: to pay for degree expenses

loans.name: Taeipo

texts.en: Taeipo is 40 years old and married with nine children. She owns and operates a small store, selling items such as snacks, groceries, frozen food, etc. She has been doing this for four years. Taeipo needs a loan to buy chicken, ice cream, sausages, flour, sugar, salt, onions, noodles, toilet paper, laundry soap, powder, tin fish, and corned beef. She hopes to use her profits to support her family. She became a member of SPBD in 2014 to gain access to capital for her business.

loans.use: to buy chicken, ice cream, sausages, flour, sugar, salt, onions, noodles, toilet paper, laundry soap, powder, tin fish, and corned beef

loans.name: Lesina

texts.en: Lesina is a 44-year-old married woman with 5 children. She has a small plantation where she has been growing taro and banana crops for many years. Lesina has requested a loan to buy a backpack sprayer, barbed wire, bush knives, a pickaxe, shovel and empty water gallon for her plantation. She joined SPBD in 2014. Lesina hopes to use her profits to provide for her family's everyday needs, support her children's education and maintain the good quality of her plantation.

loans.use: to buy a backpack sprayer, barbed wire, bush knives, a pickaxe, shovel and empty water gallon

loans.name: Jaya Usaha Baluk Group

texts.en:
The Jaya Usaha Baluk group runs their pig business well. The pigs grow healthy and fat. They give them nutrious feed and vitamins. The group earned a high price when they sold the pigs together to the big buyer. Most of them are satisfied with the result.

Ni Nengah sold all of her pigs. Having support from her husband, she is determined to increase the business to support the income of her family. Becoming one of the sources of her family's income, Ni Nengah requested a new loan to increase the pig business. With full support from her husband, Ni Nengah will use her loan to purchase quality feed and two superior piglets for fattening. The advantage of the business is for saving and using it for capital later. Now with 10 members, the group received a 20.000.000 IDR loan and Ni Nengah received 2.000.000 IDR. She hopes the plan runs smoothly and she can ears more profit.

loans.use: to buy two superior piglets and feed.

loans.name: Jugmaya

texts.en:
Jugmaya is 50 years-old.  She is married and has one child, age 25.  Many years ago, she established her grocery store business.  Working 7 days a week and 12 hours a day, she supports her family.  She has already received and successfully repaid five loans from Patan BPW and used her most recent to buy grocery goods for her business.  In the future, Jugmaya plans to uplift the economic condition of her family.  She thanks you for your support. 

In the Kathmandu Valley, the small grocery store, called a pasal, is an important part of the local economy.  Fresh produce, milk, and staples such as rice, lentils, and flour are purchased daily for cooking in the home.  Owners of small grocery stores use Kiva loans to increase their purchasing power and profit margins.  By keeping inventory strong and purchasing in larger amounts, owners of these small stores are able to increase profitability.  While a typical pasal might be no more than 100 sq. feet, they are always full of bargaining customers, incoming produce, and shrewd businesswomen.

loans.use: to buy grocery goods

loans.name: Sabrina

texts.en: Sabrina is 23 years old and single with no children. She runs a small business selling cooked food in her community and has been doing this for many years. Sabrina has requested a loan to buy boxes of chicken, sausage, rice, curry, soy sauce, onions, large containers, foil, and foam plates. She joined SPBD in 2013 to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Sabrina will help support her family's everyday needs and improve her business.

loans.use: to buy boxes of chicken, sausage, rice, curry, soy sauce, onion, large containers, foil, and foam plates.

loans.name: Lĩnh

texts.en:
Mrs. Lĩnh is 46 years old, married and has 1 child.  She lives in Quang Xuong district, a  rural town in Thanh Hoa province and works in agriculture, farming food.

This is Lĩnh's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women and  Lĩnh has been involved in her business for more than 10 years.

The main hardship that Lĩnh faces in her life is not having a hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and brick to build a toilet.

In the future, Lĩnh hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and brick to build a toilet

loans.name: Hoài

texts.en:
Hoài is 30 years old, married and has 2 children.  Hoài supports her 2 dependents with her retail business, selling clothes, in Quang Xuong district, a  rural town in Thanh Hoa province.  Hoài has been involved in this business for 7 years and this is her first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

The main hardship that Hoài faces in her life is not having a hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and brick to build a toilet and bath-room.

With her business profit, Hoài hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and to make enough money to provide for her kids.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and brick to build a toilet and bath-room.

loans.name: Ân

texts.en:
Ân works in agriculture farming poultry and cattle. She has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. Ân is 56 years old and is married with four children. She lives and works in Thieu Hoa district, a rural area in Thanh Hoa province, with no dependents.

The main hardship that Ân faces in her life is not having a clean water system and hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, and brick to build toilet and bathroom. This is Ân's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women. 

With her business profit, Ân hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her children to find good jobs, and to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, and brick to build a toilet and bathroom .

loans.name: Letecia

texts.en:
Letecia is from  Sindangan, Zamboanga del Norte, Philippines. She is 49 years old and is married with one child.

In 2011, Letecia applied for her membership with PMPC.  Hearing all of the benefits, she never hesitated to become a member.  She maintains the status of being a member in good standing and makes her repayments in a timely manner.

For this loan, Letecia is asking for PHP 14,000 to purchase seeds, fertilizers and insecticide for her corn production.  She hopes that this will increase her income and be of help in the expansion of her business.  

She has found assistance for her financial needs through Paglaum Multi Purpose Cooperative and she is very thankful with all of her heart.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizers and insecticide for her corn production

loans.name: Virginia

texts.en:
Virginia is from Sindangan, Zamboanga del Norte, Philippines. She is 65 years old and is married with four children. 

In 2008, Virginia applied for membership with PMPC. Hearing all the benefits, she never hesitated to become a member. She maintains the status of being a member in good standing and repays her obligations in a timely manner.

Recently, Virginia asked for financial assistance of PHP 7,000 to buy fertilizer and insecticide for her rice production. Through this loan, she hopes to increase her income and expand her business. She appreciates the financial assistance from Paglaum Multi Purpose Cooperative and she is very thankful with all her heart.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and insecticide for her rice production

loans.name: Elgina

texts.en:
Elgina is 41 years old and married with five children. She lives in Silangit, Tangub City, Philippines.
Elgina is a farmer, growing corn to earn a living. She has been doing this for 10 years. She has requested a loan to buy fertilizer. 
Elgina has been a member of PMPC for six years. In the future, Elgina hopes to own more farmland.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her corn plantation

loans.name: Rebecca

texts.en: Rebecca is 62 years old and lives in Taraka, Jimenez,  Misamis Occidental. She is married and has 3 children, now adults. Rebecca has a little store, where she sells groceries and other consumable products. She earns approximately PHP 3,000 each month from the business. Rebecca has requested a loan to purchase additional groceries and other consumable products for retail. Rebecca has been a member of PMPC for almost 4 years. In the future she hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: To purchase additional groceries and other consumable products for retail

loans.name: Guljahon

texts.ru:
Гулжахон  веселая общительная девушка. Она замужем. Имеет троих прекрасных детей.  У Гулжахон  дружная семья. Муж Гулжахон  мастер. Он по сезону ремонтирует дома. Кроме этого он еще дома занимается животноводством, разводит мелко рогатый скот. Сама Гулжахон  мастерица на все руки, она очень трудолюбивая и целеустремленная. Гулжахон   дома приготавливает традиционные, национальные колбасы на продажу.  У Гулжахон  такое произведение очень вкусно получается, она их отвозит в продуктовый рынок и раздает по оптовой цене. Но это не основная работа Гулжахона, кроме приготовление национальной колбасы она еще торгует на рынке.
 Гулжахон  продает детскую одежду. Она свой бизнес недавно начала, раньше она торговала  овощами.  Но со временем перешла к торговле  детской одежды. Гулжахон  детские вещи привозит с города. С наступлением весны Гулжахон  должна привести сезонные весенние вещи. Так как зима была холодной , торговля тоже немножко замерла и конечно же  товарооборот уменьшилось. Для покупки товара Гулжахону  нужны денежные средства, поэтому она подала заявку на кредит в надежде, что организация Арванд поддержит её и своевременно предоставит свои услуги.  Все ее стремление и упорства ради  благополучие семье. Она мечтает, чтоб ее дети росли, здоровы и жили в достатке.
texts.en:
Guljahon is a cheerful and sociable young woman. She is married and has three wonderful children. Guljahon has a friendly family. Guljahon's husband is a repairman. He has seasonal repair work. In addition, he raises livestock at home, breeding cattle. Guljahon herself is a master of all trades. She is very hardworking and determined. Guljahon cooks traditional, national sausages at home for sale. Guljahon's product is so tasty, and he brings them to the grocery market and sells them wholesale. But this is not her main work; in addition to preparing national sausages, she also trades at the market.

Guljahon sells children's clothing. She began her own business not long ago, and previously sold vegetables, but eventually moved to selling children's clothing. Guljahon transports children's things from the city. With the onset of spring, Guljahon must bring seasonal spring articles. Since winter was cold, trade was also a bit frozen and of course turnover decreased. In order to buy goods, Guljahon needs money and therefore she put in a loan application in hope that the organization Arvand would support her and provide services in a timely manner.

All her aspirations and perseverance are for the sake of her family's well-being. She dreams that her children will grow up healthy and will live in prosperity.

loans.use: to buy  children's clothes

loans.name: Primavera Group

texts.es:
El grupo Primavera está en su segundo ciclo del programa de comité de mujeres, es de la ciudad de  Curuguaty, la cual es una zona no muy alejada de la zona céntrica y se encuentra en crecimiento, por lo que las integrantes de este grupo quieren luchar por ir creciendo y dar a la zona donde viven un mejor ambiente y que vayan creciendo lentamente.
Irma es una de las integrantes de este grupo, ella se dedica a criar y vender animales de corral, como ser gallinas, cerdos, patos y demás, y es por medio de este trabajo que ella está luchando por poder ayudar a su familia con los ingresos que ella está obteniendo.
Irma pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de balanceados para sus animales, ya que de esa forma podrá seguir luchando y esforzándose por mejorar las condiciones de vida de sus seres queridos.
texts.en:
The group Primavera, or Spring, is in its second cycle of the women's committee program. It is in the city of Curuguaty, which is in an area not far from the downtown area.It is growing, so the members of this group want to fight for growth and give the area where they live a better environment as they slowly grow.
Irma is one of the members of the group. She raises and sells barnyard animals for a living like hens, pigs, ducks, etc.  It is through this work that she is struggling to help her family with the income that she is obtaining.
Irma requests this loan to be able to invest it in the purchase of feed for her animals. In that way, she will be able to continue fighting and strengthening herself to improve the living conditions of her loved ones.

loans.use: to buy animal feed.

loans.name: Định

texts.en:
Định is 30 years old and he is married with one children. He lives and works in Thieu Hoa district, a rural area in Thanh Hoa province, with one dependent. Định has a service business repairing motorcycles. He has been involved in this business for 8 years.

The main hardship that Định faces in his life is not having a clean water system or a hygienic latrine. He is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and brick to build a toilet and bathroom. This is Định's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women.

With his business profit, Định hopes for his family to be healthy and happy, to remodel his house, and to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for his business.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, and brick to build a toilet and bathroom.

loans.name: Thủy

texts.en:
Thủy is 36 years old and is married with 2 children.  She lives in Quang Xuong district, a  rural town in Thanh Hoa province.  

Thủy works in agriculture, farming food, and has been involved in this business for more than 10 years; this is her first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

One of the most critical difficulties that concerns her is not having money to repair her latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, brick, and the equipment required to repair her latrine.

In the future Thủy hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and for her children to do well in school.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, brick and equipment to repair a latrine/toilet

loans.name: Tú

texts.en:
Tú is 46 years old and married with 2 children.  Tú lives with her 2 dependents in Nong Cong district, a  rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

Tú works in agriculture, farming poultry and cattle, and has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. This is Tú's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

One of the most critical difficulties that concerns her is not having a bathroom.  She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and brick to build a toilet and bathroom.

With her business profit, Tú hopes to make enough money to provide for her kids, for her family to be healthy and happy, and to build a new house.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and brick to build a toilet and bath-room.

loans.name: San Agustin Emboscada Group

texts.es:
El grupo San Agustin Emboscada está en su ciclo número 2°  del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante.  Ellas están luchando por poder ayudar a sus familias y darles todo lo que ellas no pudieron tener.
Una de las integrantes es la Ilda,  quien hace sombreros de caranday, venta de chicharrón, y también tiene despena en la que trabaja todos los días. Como se puede ver ella es una mujer muy trabajadora, que a través de su esfuerzo y trabajo se ha abierto camino y hoy día tiene ya una muy buena clientela, con lo que se gana la vida de una forma digna y honesta.
La Sra. Ilda pide este crédito para la compra de comestibles, bebidas, verduras, frutas, ect., lo que le ayudará a tener a concretar su plan de negocio, el cual le ayudará a mejorar sus ingresos. Todas agradecen por la oportunidad que están recibiendo de seguir creciendo y mejorando sus condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
The San Agustin Emboscada group is in its 2nd cycle of the communal bank program, where everyone works and helps each other to move forward.

They are fighting to be able to help their families and to give them everything that they could not have.

One of the members is Ilda, who makes straw hats, sells pork rinds, and also has a store in which she works every day.

As you can see, she is a very hard-working woman who has made her way through her effort and work. Today she has a very good clientele, from which she earns a living in a dignified and honest way.

Ilda is asking for this loan in order to buy food products, drinks, vegetables, fruit, etc., which will help her to realize her business plan, which will help her to improve her income. All of the members are thankful for the opportunity that they are receiving to continue growing and improving their living conditions.

loans.use: to buy food products, drinks, vegetables, fruit, etc.

loans.name: Ramita

texts.en:
Ramita is 37 years-old .  She is married and has 2 children aged 8 and 3.   Many years ago, she established  her grocery store business.  Working 7 days a week and 12 hours a day, she supports her family.  She has already received and successfully repaid 3 loans from Patan BPW and used her most recent to buy grocery goods for her business.  In the future, Ramita plans to uplift the economic condition of her family.  She thanks you for your support. 

In the Kathmandu Valley, the small grocery store, called a pasal, is an important part of the local economy.  Fresh produce, milk, and staples such as rice, lentils, and flour are purchased daily for cooking in the home.  Owners of small grocery stores use Kiva loans to increase their purchasing power and profit margins.  By keeping inventory strong and purchasing in larger amounts, owners of these small stores are able to increase profitability.  While a typical pasal might be no more than 100 sq. feet, they are always full of bargaining customers, incoming produce, and shrewd businesswomen.

loans.use: to buy grocery goods

loans.name: Bijeshwori

texts.en:
Bijeshwori is 35 years old .  She is married and has one child, aged 6. Many years ago, she established  her grocery store business.  Working 7 days a week and 12 hours a day, she supports her family.  She has already received and successfully repaid 5 loans from Patan BPW and used her most recent to buy grocery goods for her business.  In the future, Bijeshwori plans to uplift the economic condition of her family.  She thanks you for your support.

In the Kathmandu Valley, the small grocery store, called a pasal, is an important part of the local economy.  Fresh produce, milk, and staples such as rice, lentils, and flour are purchased daily for cooking in the home.  Owners of small grocery stores use Kiva loans to increase their purchasing power and profit margins.  By keeping inventory strong and purchasing in larger amounts, owners of these small stores are able to increase profitability.  While a typical pasal might be no more than 100 sq. feet, they are always full of bargaining customers, incoming produce, and shrewd businesswomen.

loans.use: to buy grocery goods

loans.name: Sunita

texts.en:
Sunita, 45 years old, is married and has 2 children, aged 28 and 25. Many years ago, she established  her grocery store business. Working 7 days a week and 12 hours a day, she supports her family. Sunita has already received and successfully repaid 1 loan from Patan BPW and used it to buy grocery goods for her business. In the future, Sunita plans to uplift her family's economic condition. She thanks you for your support. 

In the Kathmandu Valley, the small grocery store, called a pasal, is an important part of the local economy. Fresh produce, milk, and staples such as rice, lentils, and flour are purchased daily for cooking in the home. Owners of small grocery stores use Kiva loans to increase their purchasing power and profit margins. By keeping inventory strong and purchasing in larger amounts, owners of these small stores are able to increase profitability. While a typical pasal might be no more than 100 sq. feet, they are always full of bargaining customers, incoming produce, and shrewd businesswomen.

loans.use: to buy grocery goods

loans.name: Judith

texts.en:
Judith, 36, is married and has a daughter.  The family live in their own wooden house. 

Judith sells clothing and sandals at her stand at the local market that she set up with savings she had from temporary jobs and with the support of her husband. She started selling only a few items in an effort to start a new commercial challenge.

From very early in the morning she receives different customers who buy a variety of women's, men's and children's clothing. She tries to keep a stock of shoes and blankets which are also popular among the customers.

She enjoys her sales activity, especially on weekends when there are more farmers and other people who live far away from town and come to make their weekly purchases.

This is her forth loan and she is grateful for the support she has received. She is requesting PHP10,000 to buy clothing, including men's polo shirts and blouses etc., as well as sandals.

loans.use: to buy clothing, including men's polo shirts and blouses, as well as sandals

loans.name: 13 - Quảng Thành Group

texts.en:
Đào, 51, is the leader of the 13 - Quảng Thành solidarity group, which consists of six members. She is married, has two children and lives in Thanh Hoa city, a urban town in Thanh Hoa province.

For the past ten years Đào has raised poultry and cattle for a living. Her main difficulty is the lack of capital that would allow her to expand her farm.

This will be Đào’s first loan with FPW. She is requesting a 45,000,000 VND loan to be apportioned among her group. She will use her share to buy baby poultry and cattle to raise and resell.

With her business profits Đào hopes to see her family healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and to travel within Vietnam on vacation.

loans.use: to buy baby poultry and cattle to raise and resell

loans.name: Riclen

texts.en: Riclen is 23 years old and lives in Sindangan, Zamboanga del Norte, Philippines. In order to help the family, she sells vegetables and fruits in the market. Riclen also operates a small-time eatery as she knows that selling fruits and vegetables is not sufficient for her daily needs. In 2008, she became an active member of Paglaum MPC with good credit standing. Riclen wants to obtain financial assistance in the amount of PHP 5,000 to purchase raw ingredients, such as kilos of meat and spices. She plans to send her children to college so that they can help her in the future and to repair their house.

loans.use: to purchase raw ingredients such as meat and spices.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy clothing and footwear.

loans.name: Marites

texts.en:
Marites is 40 years old and married with 3 children. She lives in Manga, Tangub City Philippines.

Marites sells goods to earn a living and has had this business for 8 years. Each month, she earns PHP 6000 doing this type of work. She has requested a loan for PHP 11000 to restock basic commodities, like rice, for her sari-sari store.

Marites has been a member of PMPC for 9 months.  In the future, Marites hopes to open a carenderia.

loans.use: to restock basic commodities, like rice, for her sari-sari store

loans.name: Josie

texts.en:
Josie is 43 years old and lives in Silangit, Tangub City. She is married and has 3 children. Josie works in the fish industry, selling and catching fish for a living. She has been doing this for 16 years. Josie has requested a loan to purchase fishing equipment. 

Josie has been a member of PMPC for 4 years. In the future, she hopes to buy another fishing boat to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fishing equipment

loans.name: Selesitina

texts.en: Selesitina is 49 years old and a partner woman with four children. She runs a small business selling fish in her community and has been doing this for many years. Selesitina has requested a loan to buy fishing gear, goggles, a fishing rod, fishing net and snorkel equipment. She joined SPBD in 2013 to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Selesitina will continue supporting her children's education and helping with her family's daily needs.

loans.use: to buy fishing gear, goggles, a fishing rod, fishing net and snorkel equipment

loans.name: Julieta

texts.en:
Julieta is 53 years old, married and has five children. Her husband is a hollow block-maker.

Julieta raises hogs, and she cleans her pigpens daily. Once they get fat enough, she sells them to butchers.

Julieta is now applying for a 5,000 PHP loan through ASKI to buy feed and vaccines for her hogs to help ensure their good health and growth. She intends to keep raising hogs to earn more income.

loans.use: to buy feed and vaccines for her hogs

loans.name: Clara Eulalia

texts.es:
La Señora Clara forma parte del grupo de crédito Los Talvos, vive por los alrededores de la parroquia del Valle en Cuenca, es reconocida por su importante producción de maíz, teniendo como atractivos las lagunas de Chochapamba (llenas de Totoras), su gente es trabajadora, amable y gentil.
La Señora Clara tiene 31 años de edad, es madre soltera de 3 hijos de 9, 8 y 7 años de edad, todos están estudiando en una escuelita de la localidad, la casa en la que vive es propia
Doña Clara desde hace dos años tienen una tienda en a la cual le dedica mucho tiempo, también se dedica a la cría de pollos y cuyes, cultiva la tierra y lo que cosecha es para el consumo de su casa y la venta. 
El dinero de su crédito anterior lo invirtió en la compra de víveres para su tienda, esta repitiendo su nuevo crédito para la compra de pollos, cuyes y víveres para su tienda. Su grupo de crédito le gusta por la amistad y solidaridad que existe entre todas las socias del grupo.
texts.en:
Sra. Clara is a member of the Communal Bank “Los Talvos”. She lives in the neighborhood that surrounds the parish of Valle in the city of Cuenca, which is known for being a major producer of corn and having attractions, such as the Lakes of Chochapamba, which are full of totora reeds. The people are hardworking, friendly, and kind.

Sra. Clara is a 31-year-old single mother with three children (ages 9, 8, and 7), all of whom attend an elementary school in town. She owns the house in which she lives. Two years ago, Doña Clara opened a store where she now spends a great deal of time. She also raises chickens and guinea pigs, cultivates her land, and sets asides what she harvests for household consumption and for sale.

The money from her previous loan was invested in the purchase of provisions for her store. This time she is requesting another loan in order to buy chickens, guinea pigs, as well as provisions for her store. She enjoys her Communal Bank because of the friendship and unity that exists among all of the group members.

loans.use: to buy chickens, guinea pigs, as well as provisions for her store.

loans.name: Lorenza

texts.en:
Lorenza is a 36-year-old woman with five children. For the past three years she has operated a sari sari, or general store, where she sells such items as canned goods, rice and snack foods.

Lorenza became a member of ASKI in 2013 to gain access to a loan for her business. She is applying for a 10,000 PHP loan to buy stock for her store such as candy, drinks, spices and rice. She intends to use her profits to support her family.

loans.use: to buy stock for her store

loans.name: Maria Auxiliadora Group

texts.es:
El grupo “Maria Auxiliadora” está en el 1º ciclo del programa de comité de mujeres,  ellas están empezando a trabajar juntas, y tienen gran entusiasmo de poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida, y así ayudar a su familia.
Una integrante es la Sra. Marta, quien tiene una despensa, ella comenta que poco a poco está creciendo en su negocio, con lo cual ayuda a su familia por medio de los ingresos que tiene.  Ella es una persona que se está esforzando por poder mejorar su vida y la de su familia.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de azúcar, fideos, carne, leche, panificados, arroz, bebidas, aceite, harina, etc., con lo que podrá seguir con sus ventas, y de esa forma poder seguir luchando por sus seres queridos.
texts.en:
The "Maria Auxiliadora" [Mary Help of Christians] group is in its 1st cycle of the communal bank program. They are starting to work together, and they are very enthusiastic about being able to improve their living conditions and thus help their families.

One member is Marta, who has a store. She notes that her business is growing little by little, and with it she helps her family through the income it brings in. She is a person who is exerting herself to be able to improve her life and that of her family.

She is asking for this loan in order to be able to buy sugar, noodles, meat, milk, bread products, rice, drinks, oil, flour, etc., with which she will be able to continue selling, and in that way be able to continue fighting for her loved ones.

loans.use: to buy sugar, noodles, meat, milk, bread products, rice, drinks, oil, flour, etc.

loans.name: Paulita

texts.en: Paulita is 59 years old, married and has three children. Her spouse is a tricycle driver and a heavy-equipment operator. Paulita also sells food such as "morcon" (Filipino meat roll and a type of chorizo) to the people in her village. Her income is used for her family's expenses. Now, she is asking for PHP 5,000 to buy gasoline for the motorcycle and meat to cook morcon. She will pay back her weekly obligation and will continue to improve her savings.

loans.use: to buy gasoline for her husband's motorcycle and meat to cook and sell

loans.name: Otoniel De Jesús

texts.es:
Otoniel, a sus 62 años de edad, vive con su esposa y es padre de dos hijos mayores de edad, a los que sacó adelante con mucho empeño y dedicación.
Desde hace 37  años se gana la vida trabajando como mecánico de camiones de carga pesada, oficio que aprendió desde joven y se ha convertido en su principal fuente de ingresos.
El crédito solicitado lo invertirá en la compra de herramientas de trabajo (llaves, tuercas, tornillos), esto le permitirá ofrecer un servicio ágil y completo a sus clientes y podrá aumentar los ingresos que percibe con su labor.
Otoniel manifiesta que su mayor anhelo es tener un taller mucho más grande para atender un mayor número de clientes de diferentes zonas, así tendrá una estabilidad económica favorable y podrá disfrutar con su esposa de una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Otoniel, 62 years old, lives with his wife and is the father of two grown children, whom he moved forward with a lot of determination and dedication.

For 37 years, he has made a living working as a mechanic for heavy load trucks. He learned the work from the time he was young and it has become his main source of income.

He will use the loan requested to buy work tools (wrenches, nuts, screws). This will allow him to offer flexible and complete service to his customers, and he will be able to increase the income he receives from his labor.

Otoniel says that his greatest desire is to have a much larger shop in order to wait on a greater number of customers from different areas. In this way he will have favorable economic stability and will be able to enjoy a better quality of life with his wife.

loans.use: to buy work tools (wrenches, nuts, screws)

loans.name: Oscar

texts.es:
Oscar tiene 30 años, él es macatero (vendedor ambulante) con más de ocho años de experiencia, trabaja casi todos los días de la semana.
Él es una persona muy trabajadora, que está poniendo su mejor esfuerzo por salir adelante por medio de su trabajo y su lucha diaria. Solicitó el préstamo para la compra de ropas y utensilios para la cocina en Gral. Ya que de esa forma podrá seguir con sus ventas.
Él agradece por la oportunidad que está recibiendo, y que le permitirá seguir creciendo.
texts.en:
Oscar is 30 years old. He is a macatero (street vendor) with more than eight years of experience. He works almost every day of the week.

He is a very hard-working person who is making his best effort to move forward through his work and his daily struggle. He is asking for the loan in order to buy clothing and general kitchen utensils. In this way, he will be able to continue selling.

He is thankful for the opportunity he is receiving, and that it will allow him to continue growing.

loans.use: to buy clothing to sell and kitchen utensils

loans.name: Malia

texts.en:
Malia is a 41-year-old partner woman with three children. She has a small plantation and grows banana and taamu to earn a living. She has been doing this for many years. Malia Elena has requested a loan to buy a backpack sprayer, chemicals, a wheelbarrow and barbed wire.. 

She has been a member of SPBD since 2013. With her profits, Malia Elena hopes to support her children's education.

loans.use: to buy a backpack sprayer, chemicals, a wheelbarrow and barbed wire

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay tuition.

loans.name: Blas

texts.es:
Blas tiene 42 años está acompañado con la Sra. Luisa quien le ayuda todos los días,  es vendedor ambulante desde hace más de 10 años.
Él es una persona muy trabajadora, que desde joven ha luchado y ha trabajado por poder mejorar su vida.  Comenta que se ha hecho ya de muy buena clientela, ya que siempre ofrece una buena variedad a sus clientes y de esa forma ha ido creciendo.
Solicitó el préstamo para la compra de parrillas, cortinas y utensilios para la cocina en Gral., y de esa forma podrá surtirse y tener una mayor variedad que ofrecer a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Blas is 42 years old.  He is married to Luisa who helps him everyday.  He has worked as a traveling salesman for over 10 years.  He is a very hardworking person, who has fought and worked since he was young in order to improve his life.  He states that he now has a very good customer base because he always offers a good variety of products, which has allowed him to grow.

He is seeking a loan to purchase grills, curtains and cooking utensils in Gral.  This will allow him to stock his business and have a greater variety of products to offer to his customers.

loans.use: purchase grills, curtains and general cooking utensils to sell.

loans.name: Dana Kerti Group

texts.en:
The Dana Kerti Group borrowed a loan of 12,000,000 IDR and they repaid it on time. The repayment was represented by the head of the group,  Desak Gede.  Desak Gede says that the business of her pigs is running well. Before the loan, she only had one pig, and now because of the loan, she has four pigs and a sow. The sow birthed nine healthy piglets. She sold the piglets after two months to pay off the loan. She also set aside for savings to fulfill her family’s daily needs and to support her children's education. All the members of Dana Kerti feel the benefits from this business. They can support their husbands’ income. 

With the same members, the Dana Kerti Group received a new loan. To increase business, the group asked for the same loan size. The group received 12,000,000 IDR. The loan use is to purchase piglets, feeds and to renovate the cages. Desak Gede will use her loan to purchase feeds and to renovate the cage. Now she has two sows and she hopes they can give a birth again. To prepare, she buys good quality feeds and a wider the cage. She hopes the planning will run well and that she can sell the piglets in her village.

loans.use: to purchase feeds, and to renovate the cage.

loans.name: Tucsan Group

texts.es:
La socia Francisca pertenece al banco comunal TUCSAN, el banco está ubicado en la comunidad de Tucsan, distrito de Pisaq, provincia de Calca, departamento de Cusco.

La socia Francisca tiene 41 años de edad y es casada, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de crianza de animales menores como pollos, la socia lleva buen tiempo dedicándose a este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día  a su negocio, la socia cría a estos animalitos para luego venderlos a sus clientes que le solicitan, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de pollos y alimentos para su negocio.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
Los demás socios se dedican a la artesania, servicios agropecuarios, maestro constructor, agricultura, turismo.
texts.en:
Francisca is a member of the TUSCAN communal bank, located in the Tuscan Community, within the Pisaq district, Calca province, Cusco department.

Francisca is 41 years old, married, and raises small animals like chickens.  She has been doing this for some time and things are going well for her, thanks to her dedication.  She raises the chickens to later sell them to her customers.  She is asking for this loan so she can continue to work and support her family.

She will use the money to buy chickens and feed for her business.  She is grateful for the loan and is committed to making her payments on time.

The other members are artists, farmers, builders, fish farmers, and work in tourism.

loans.use: to buy chickens and feed.

loans.name: Novie

texts.en:
Novie previously took out a 30,000 PHP loan through CCT which she used to buy more quantities and varieties of grocery items and products for her sari sari, or general store. Her profits were a big help in supporting the household’s daily needs and her children’s school expenses.

Novie is now applying for another 20,000 PHP loan to buy groceries, toiletries, beverages and other products to add to her inventory. She knows that the more items displayed at the store, the better, as this will result in greater profits.

Novie hopes to be more successful in her business and dreams of giving her children a good life and education. She looks forward to the assistance from this loan with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

All CCT community clients, including Novie, are organized into fellowship groups of fifteen to thirty members who meet on a weekly basis. There they share stories of their work, repay microfinance loans and draw strength and inspiration from their study of the Word of God.

loans.use: to buy stock for her store

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es:
María Elena es una señora de 53 años que desde su niñez ha velado por la salud de las demás personas. Desde pequeña ayudaba a cuidar gente que debido a una enfermedad necesitaban la asistencia de alguien más. Fue entonces cuando encontró su vocación como enfermera. Ahora lleva 21 años apoyando al hospital de Masaya, gracias a su licenciatura en enfermería.
Por esta razón, doña María Elena sabe que es necesario tener un buen servicio higiénico en su casa. Es por esto que solicita el préstamo para construir un baño y un inodoro, puesto que el pon pon que tiene se encuentra en condiciones extremadamente deterioradas, que en cualquier momento podrían causar un accidente. Además, las condiciones de este tipo de servicios atraen muchos animales que pueden provocar enfermedades. Lo positivo es que la heroína de la salud nicaragüense tiene un valor de responsabilidad alto, por lo que entre sus metas tiene pagar en tiempo y forma su crédito, además de sacarle provecho.
texts.en:
María Elena is a 53-year-old woman who has looked after the health of other people since she was a child. At a young age, she cared for people who were sick and needed the assistance of others. It was at that time that she discovered her calling as a nurse. For the past 21 years she has been providing this type of support at a hospital in Masaya, thanks to her degree in nursing.

For this reason, Doña María Elena knew that it was necessary that she have good sanitation services in her home. She is requesting a loan in order to build a bathroom with a toilet. The existing facilities are in an extremely deteriorated condition and could cause an accident at any moment. Furthermore, the conditions for this type of service could attract animals that spread diseases. The positive side is that this heroine of the Nicaraguan health system places value on being highly responsible. As a result, her goals are to take advantage of this loan and to repay it on time and in the correct manner.

loans.use: to build a bathroom with a toilet.

loans.name: Muazzam

texts.ru:
Муаззам добрая трудолюбивая женщина. Ей 45 лет. Она родилась в Спитаменском районе и до сегодняшнего дня проживает там. С ранних лет Муаззам  увлекалась шитьем. В детстве она шила платья  для своей куклы . Повзрослев Муаззам начала шить  национальные платья для своих соседок. У Муаззам нет высшего образования, сразу же после окончания школы она продолжила изучать все секреты швеи. Шитье для Муаззам стало частью её жизни. Даже после замужество она не прекратила вышивать, а наоборот набрала большего опыта. После Муаззам с подругой открыли ателье  и начали там шить военные формы Солдатом. У нее и на сегодняшний день  клиентов  много, ведь она не только на заказы шьет формы, но и  на продажу в соседние районы тоже шьет. Бывает, что на работе не успевает выполнять заказы, поэтому она их забирает домой. 
Муаззам благодаря своей работе поженила двоих сыновей. Помогла сыну поступить в университет и  второму своему сыну она хотела бы дать образование, чтоб в будущем они стали образованными и успешными людьми. Муаззам не собирается остановиться на достигнутом. На  протяжении многих лет Муаззам активно сотрудничает с МДО Арванд. Она брала кредиты для покупки тканей. И вот в очередной раз Муаззам получает кредит, чтоб выполнить свой крупный заказ военным. Она хочет купить ткани и нитки.  Муаззам выражает свою благодарность Арванд  за многолетнюю поддержку и за доверия.
texts.en:
Muazzam is a kind and hardworking woman. She is 45 years old. She was born in the Spitamen region and lives there to this day. From an early age, Muazzam was fond of sewing. In childhood, she sewed dresses for her dolls. Growing up, Muazzam started to sew national dresses for her neighbors. Muazzam does not have a higher education; immediately after graduation she proceeded to learn all the secrets of the seamstress. Sewing for Muazzam became a part of her life. Even after getting married, she did not stop embroidering, but rather to gain more experience. Later, Muazzam and her friend opened a workshop and began sewing soldiers' uniforms. Even to this day, she has many customers and she not only takes orders to sew uniforms but also sews for her neighboring areas. It happens that she does not have time to complete the orders at work and so she takes them home.

Muazzam through her work has been able to get her two sons married. She was able to help her son enroll in university and she would like to give an education for her second son, such that in the future they will become educated and successful people. Muazzam is not going to stop there.

Over the years, Muazzam has actively cooperating with MDO Arvand. She took loans to purchase fabrics. And her once again Muazzam is receiving a loan in order to fulfill her large military order. She wants to buy fabric and thread. Muazzam expresses her gratitude to Arvand for many years of support and trust.

loans.use: to buy fabric and thread

loans.name: Barbara Hilda

texts.es:
La socia Barbara Hilda se sigue dedicando al negocio de tienda de abarrotes, la socia vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azucar, leche y galletas, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 5 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de tienda de abarrotes. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar arroz, azucar, leche y galletas.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Barbara Hilda continues to work in her grocery store.  The member sells basic goods such as rice, sugar, milk, and cookies.  She works from 8am to 7pm.  She has been in this business for five years, and it has gone very well for her.  Her dream is to expand her grocery store.  

She is seeking this loan to purchase rice, sugar, milk, and cookies.  She is very happy with the loan, and she is committed to making the scheduled payments.

loans.use: purchase rice, sugar, milk, and cookies.

loans.name: Mirian

texts.es:
Mirian es estudiante del segundo año en la carrera de Administración de Empresas, ella trabaja  en el área administrativa de una empresa pública.
Ella vive con sus padres y  hermanos, comenta que sus  metas futuras son trabajar en su profesión,  pudiendo montar su propia empresa y administrarla ella misma. 
Con este préstamo estaría abonando la matricula del año lectivo y también realizará la compra de los materiales de lectura necesarios. Ella Anhela destacarse  como una excelente profesional y  a través de ello lograr su progreso.
texts.en:
Mirian is a second year business management student and works in the public company management field.

She lives with her parents and siblings and says that her goals are to work in her profession and then start her own company and manage it herself.

She will use this loan to pay her tuition and buy her textbooks.  She wants to become an excellent professional and move ahead in life.

loans.use: to pay tuition and buy textbooks.

loans.name: Shandy

texts.es:
La socia Shandy se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de vinos,la socia vende desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien,la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de venta de vinos.Ls socia solicita el credito para comprar vinos.

La socia agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
Shandy is a member who has a wine-selling business. She works from 8 am until 5 pm. She has run this business for several years, and it is going very well. Her dream is to expand her wine-selling business. She is asking for a loan to buy wine.

She is grateful for this loan and undertakes to meet all her loan repayments according to the loan schedule.

loans.use: to buy wine.

loans.name: Christian

texts.es: El señor Christian, es casado con la señora Mariela Nadia, ambos tienen un hijo dependiente a su cargo, viven con sus padres en la misma casa y con sus hermanos, son de familia humilde, sencilla y trabajadora,  el señor trabaja prestando sus servicios como distribuidor en una reconocida empresa de productos farmacéuticos con una antigüedad de tres años. El destino del crédito es para comprar una motocicleta, para movilizarse de su casa a su trabajo, la motocicleta le servirá para ir a su trabajo que se encuentra a 10 km. de la ciudad de Cochabamba, en ese sentido, será de mayor beneficio para él porque actualmente vive en la zona norte de la ciudad y su trabajo le quedaba muy lejos de esta forma podrá movilizarse con mayor comodidad.
texts.en:
Christian is married to Mariela Nadia.  Together, they have a son under their care.  They in a house with his parents and his siblings.  They are a humble, simple and hardworking family.  Christian works lending his services as a distributor in a well-known pharmaceutical company, a job that he has done for three years.

The loan will be used to purchase a motorcycle to travel from his house to his job.  The motorcycle will help him to get to his job which is 10km from the city of Cochabamba.  This will be very beneficial for him because currently, he lives in the northern region of the city, and his job is very faraway.  Therefore, he will be able to travel to work more easily.

loans.use: purchase a motorcycle.

loans.name: Jairo Miguel

texts.es:
Jairo es un campesino humilde y trabajador de 43 años de edad, casado y padre de 2 hijos a los que ha sacado adelante con empeño y dedicación.
Actualmente posee cultivos de yuca y plátano, cuyas cosechas se recolectan y son vendidas en la plaza de mercado de la región, de esta forma genera los ingresos suficientes para solventar los gastos familiares.
El crédito que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de insumos agrícolas (insecticidas. Abonos,  semillas), esto le permitirá continuar con su labor y tener un mejor nivel de ingresos para  dar a su familia un mejor bienestar.
Jairo sueña con tener una parcela propia para ampliar sus cultivos y obtener una cosecha más productiva, así podrá disfrutar una mejor calidad de vida en compañía de su familia.
texts.en:
Jairo is a humble and hardworking 43-year-old farmer.  He is married and has two children who he has gotten ahead through his effort and dedication.  He currently has yuca (cassava) and plantain crops.  He collects the harvests of these two crops and sells them in the region's marketplace.  Through this, he is able to earn enough income to cover his family's expenses.

The loan that he is seeking will be invested in the purchase of agricultural supplies (insecticides, manure, seed), which will allow him to continue with his work and earn a greater income to provide for his family's wellbeing.  Jairo dreams of having his own plot of land where he can expand his crops and produce a better harvest so that he can enjoy a better quality of life with his family.

loans.use: purchase agricultural supplies (insecticides, manure, seed)

loans.name: Leidy Tatiana

texts.es:
Leidy es una mujer joven, emprendedora y carismática, a sus 28 años de edad se dedica a atender su propio negocio, un taller de estampación que inició en compañía de su esposo. Sus primeros diseños eran básicos y poco a poco fueron ampliando sus conocimientos y perfeccionando sus técnicas y diseños, obteniendo un amplio reconocimiento en la zona, ventaja que beneficia sus ingresos para solventar los gastos básicos del hogar y brindar bienestar a su hijo.
El crédito solicitado será invertido en la compra de una máquina secadora industrial, necesaria para optimizar los tiempos de entrega de los pedidos y así mejorar los ingresos por las ventas que realiza.
Leidy manifiesta que su mayor anhelo es ampliar y acreditar bien su negocio, logrando una mejor rentabilidad y calidad de vida para su familia.
texts.en:
Leidy is an enterprising and charismatic young woman.  At 28 years old, she works in her own business, a screen-printing workshop, which she started with her husband.  Her first designs were basic, but little by little, their knowledge expanded and they perfected their techniques and designs.  They have generated a lot of recognition in their region, an advantage that is beneficial to their earnings, which helps them cover their basic household expenses and provide for their child's wellbeing.  

The requested loan will be used to purchase an industrial drying machine that is needed to improve their turnaround time for orders, which will improve their earnings based on the sales they will be able to make.  Leidy states that her greatest challenge is expanding her business and demonstrating its quality so that it will be more profitable and she can improve her family's quality of life.

loans.use: purchase an industrial drying machine.

loans.name: Jenny

texts.es:
Jenny está terminando la universidad solo ya le está faltando defender su tesis, la carrera que eligió es la de Educación inicial. Ella está viviendo con sus padres. Su madre es costurera y su papa no tiene sueldo seguro. Ella como persona se trazó como objetivo recibirse y tener un ingreso mejora para poder ayudar a su familia.
Es una mujer muy dedicada, y su mayor inspiración es poder ayudar a sus seres queridos, de la misma forma que estos la han ayudado.
Ella pide este préstamo para poder pagar los gastos de su tesis, lo que le será de mucha ayuda, ya que ese gasto es muy costoso. Agradece por esta oportunidad que esta recibiendo.
texts.en:
Jenny has finished her university studies and needs to defend her thesis.  She majored in Early Education.  She lives with her parents; her mother is a seamstress and her father doesn’t have a steady income.  She is a person who had the goal of graduating and having an income so she could help her family.

She is very dedicated and her greatest inspiration is to be able to help her loved ones as much as they have helped her.

She is asking for this loan so she can pay for her thesis expenses, which will be of great help, since this is very expensive.  She is grateful for this opportunity.

loans.use: to pay for her thesis.

loans.name: Marilou

texts.en:
Marilou is 54 and the mother of four. She owns and manages a small retail store within her community. It is her way of helping her husband to generate income to sustain their daily necessities. She has been in this business for almost four years and most of her income is allocated to the children's education. 

Marilou aims to further improve her business in order to increase her income. Due to insufficient capital, she would like to take out a loan of PHP 15,000 to buy additional stocks of canned goods, snack foods, beverages, seasonings, soft drinks, laundry soaps and frozen foods to sell. Through this financial assistance, she believes that she will be able to make her business grow.

loans.use: to buy additional stocks of canned goods, snack foods, beverages, seasonings, soft drinks, laundry soaps and frozen foods to sell

loans.name: Wilner Jesus

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal Kuska LLankasun de Rumichaca Baja perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba,distrito de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

El socio Wilner Jesus se dedica al negocio de albañil,el socio hace diferentes trabajos como pintar casas,construir,arreglar entre otros trabajos,el socio trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 4:00 p.m,el socio ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien,el sueño del socio es ampliar el negocio de albañil.El socio solicita el credito para comprar herramientas como brochas,pinturas y martillos.

El socio esta feliz con el credito y se compromete a pagar las cuotas.
texts.en:
Wilner Jesus is a member of the Communal Bank “Kuska Llankasun de Rumichaca Baja” which is located in the District of Urubamba, Urubamba Province, Department of Cusco.
