He has a bricklaying business, but he also performs a variety of duties such as painting houses, construction, repairs, and other types of jobs. Wilner works from 8:00 A.M. to 4:00 P.M. He has been in this business for several years and is doing very well. Wilner dreams of expanding his bricklaying business.

He is requesting a loan in order to buy equipment such as brushes, paints, and hammers. Wilner is pleased with the loan and promises to submit his payments.

loans.use: to buy equipment such as brushes, paints, and hammers.

loans.name: Noselyn

texts.en:
Noselyn, 43, is married to Norberto, who works abroad. With her children’s help she works hard running a sari sari, or variety store, where she sells inexpensive everyday items. It’s the place to go to buy one sachet of shampoo, five PHP’s-worth of cooking oil or an egg. She buys her stock at wholesale prices, then sells it by piece at retail. Her regular customers are her neighbors and people from the local community. She earns a minimum of 2000 PHP in sales every day. She also has a computer shop and rents out an apartment for additional income.

Noselyn is applying for a 60,000 PHP loan through CCT to buy groceries, toiletries and beverages to expand her product inventory. She hopes that her business will grow bigger and dreams of a good future.

All CCT community clients, including Noselyn, are organized into fellowship groups of fifteen to thirty members who meet on a weekly basis. There they share stories of their work, repay microfinance loans and draw strength and inspiration from their study of the Word of God.

loans.use: to pay for grocery items, toiletries and beverages needed in her business.

loans.name: Rolando

texts.en:
Rolando, 33, is a resident of Bacoor, Cavite City, Philippines. He is married to Analiza, a businesswoman, and they are praying to have children. He and his wife manage their household while operating the business. Rolando works hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses.
  
Rolando operates a silkscreen printing business. Silkscreen printing is the process of creating a stencil in a mesh screen, then using a squeegee and pushing the inks through the mesh onto the shirt or garment. Clients come to Rolando with their desired pattern or design for printing. He also has a ticketing office. Rolando's regular customers are his neighbors and the local community. He earns a minimum of PHP 15,000 per week.  

To help him continue operations of his business, Rolando is requesting a PHP 25,000 loan to buy more quantities of raw materials such as paint, screens and shirts. Rolando hopes to have another branch for his business and dreams of traveling with his wife. He meets up with his co-fellowship members weekly to share stories of his work.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: To pay for more quantities of raw materials such as paint, screens and shirts.

loans.name: Ninh

texts.en:
Ninh, 44 years old, has been involved in agriculture for 8 years, farming poultry and cattle. She is married and has 3 children. Ninh lives with 3 dependents in Hoang Hoa district, a  rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2007, Ninh joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. She has successfully repaid 2 loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. The main hardship that Ninh faces in her life is low profit margins. She is requesting a loan to purchase a biogas system. Ninh hopes to make enough profit to provide for her children, for her business to do well and to maintain a successful business.

loans.use: to buy a biogas system

loans.name: Robert

texts.en:
Robert is 38 years old, a responsible father to his two children. His wife works as an Overseas Filipino Worker while he is a technician and a tricycle driver. His daily income goes for meals and his wife's remittances go for education and other bills at home. Robert is asking for additional capital because he wants to keep offering good transport service. He will use this PHP 5,000 loan to buy gasoline and oils for maintaining his motorcycle. 

Robert hopes to secure a good income for his family's future.

loans.use: to buy gasoline and oils for maintaining his motorcycle.

loans.name: Amoasisifo

texts.en: Amoasisifo is 57-years-old and married with five children. She owns and operates a small store, selling items such as sugar, noodles, chicken legs, etc. She has been doing this for three years. Amoasisifo needs a loan to buy a bag of sugar, rice, flour, freezer, box of chicken legs, etc. She hopes to use her profits to support her family especially for her children.  She became a member of SPBD in 2011 to gain access to capital for her business.

loans.use: to buy a bag of flour, rice, sugar, freezer, box of chicken legs, etc.

loans.name: Nela

texts.en: Nela is 41-years-old and married with two children. She paints and sells clothes in her community to earn a living and has been doing this for two years. Nela has requested a loan to buy paint, elei board, fabrics, materials, etc. She plans to use her profits for her children's education and to support her family financially. She joined SPBD in 2012 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy paint, elei board, fabrics, materials, etc.

loans.name: Fuatino

texts.en: Fuatino is 60-years-old and single with four children. She runs a small business selling pancakes in her community and has been doing this for two years. Fuatino has requested a loan to buy a bag of flour and sugar, cooking oil, frying pan, etc. She joined SPBD in 2014 to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Fuatino will save more for unexpected emergencies and for her grandchildren's education.

loans.use: to buy a bag of flour and sugar, cooking oil, frying pan, etc.

loans.name: Margarita

texts.es:
Hoy Margarita  tiene 38 años y está en pareja con el señor Gregorio quien tiene 40 años, ambos se dedican a la compra de ventas de ropas y menajes a cuotas. Son una pareja que está luchando por mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
Comenta que gracias a su préstamo anterior pudo comprar prendas para la venta, y con ello pudo mejorar los pedidos para sus clientes. Hoy pide un nuevo préstamo para poder  comprar más prendas para la venta y de esa forma seguir mejorando su vida.
texts.en:
Margarita is now 38, and she lives with Gregorio, who is 40. They both work buying and selling clothing and home furnishings on instalments. They are a couple who are struggling to improve their living conditions.

She comments that, thanks to her previous loan, she was able to buy clothes to sell, and with it she could improve customer orders. Today she is asking for a new loan so she can buy more clothes to sell, and carry on improving her life in this way.

loans.use: to buy clothes to sell.

loans.name: Mulya Sari Group

texts.en:
Ni Ketut used the previous loan to purchase 3 superior piglets for fattening. She sold all of her pigs and earned a satisfying profit. She was really happy because, during the period, her pigs grew well and were free of disease, so she was able to sell them at a high price. The profit fulfilled daily life needs and supported the capital for her business. Ni Ketut is very grateful for MUK, KIVA and lenders for supporting her business. She said she will always need assistance from the Loan Officer of MUK to give advice and solutions for her business. During this period, 2 of the group members successfully managed their pig businesses and were able to continue with their own capital. They decided to resign from the group.

After succeeding with their last loan and inspired by 2 of their friends, the remaining 8 members of the Mulya Sari group received their new loan. Now most of the members already have sows. They need this new loan to purchase feed and superior piglets and to renovate the pens.

Ni Ketut will use her loan to purchase 3 superior piglets for fattening. She hopes that she can sell the pigs in 5 months. Her husband supports her business because it can help their family income.

loans.use: To purchase three superior piglets

loans.name: Elisa

texts.en:
Elisa, 50 years old, lives in her own house in a rural area with her husband and five children. She makes a living by making and selling cooked foods. Day to day, she rises early to go to the market to get ingredients fresh and ready that allow her to make her delicious foods. Elisa has many customers because, when it comes to cooked foods, she has the best and at the most accessible prices. 

Elisa has decided to take this PHP 30,000 loan to invest in her business, seeing as her dream is to see it grow. She plans to buy necessary, raw materials such as corn, rice, pork rind, cheese, beans, tomatoes, cabbage, etc. In this way, it can improve her quality of life. She can hope to achieve her dream and be able to give her family a better chance at life.

loans.use: to buy raw materials such as tomatoes, beans, meat and spices

loans.name: Risa

texts.en:
Risa previously accessed a 12,000 PHP loan that she used to purchase spare parts and supplies needed in her shop. Her earnings were a big help for the education of her children and for their personal, household and business expenditures.

She would like to apply for another 30,000 PHP loan for her to buy spare parts and supplies and for the maintenance of her shop. Her profits from her business will definitely help her to sustain her daily needs and educational expenses of her children. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Risa hopes that her business will grow bigger and dreams to have a better living. She meets every week with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work. This is where she also finds strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for spare parts and supplies needed for her auto repair shop.

loans.name: Sofia

texts.en: This is Sofia. Her previous loan was a big help for her business.  She would like to apply for a loan to purchase more goats for her business. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

loans.use: to purchase more goats for her business

loans.name: Soklorn

texts.en: Soklorn is 20 years old. She is a student who lives in Phnom Penh, Cambodia. Soklorn would like to apply for a loan of $300 to pay her tuition fees. This loan helps her get higher education. In the future, she hopes that she can work at a microfinance institute.

loans.use: To pay her tuition fees

loans.name: Jonina

texts.en: Jonina is a 28-year-old single woman with no children. She has a small plantation where she has been growing taro, taamu (giant taro), yams and bananas for two years. Jonina has requested a loan to buy bush knives, a weed sprayer, a wheelbarrow and chemicals. She has been a member of SBPD since 2012. Jonina hopes to use her profits to earn more money to support and help her family.

loans.use: to buy a weed sprayer, a wheelbarrow, bush knives and chemicals

loans.name: Nani

texts.en: Nani is a 22-year-old married woman with 4 children. She has a small plantation and grows taro, taamu, yams and banana to earn a living. She has been doing this for two years. Nani has requested a loan to buy bush knives, weed sprayer, wheelbarrow and chemicals. She has been a member of SBPD since 2012. With her profits, Nani hopes to earn more money to support and help her family.

loans.use: to buy weedspray, wheelbarrow, bush knives and chemicals for her farm.

loans.name: Faalia

texts.en: Faalia is a 37-year-old married lady with 4 children. She has a small garden and grows vegetables to earn a living. She has been doing this for 3 years. Faalia has requested a loan to buy weed spray, seeds, chemicals and a wheelbarrow. She has been a member of SBPD since 2011. With her profits, Faalia hopes to improve her business and to support her family financially.

loans.use: to buy weed spray, wheelbarrow, chemicals and seeds for her farm.

loans.name: Nofo

texts.en: Nofo is 36 years old and married with 4 children. She runs a small business selling pastries in her community and has been doing this for many years. Nofo has requested a loan to buy flour, sugar, yeast, eggs, baking soda and dripping oil. She joined SPBD in 2014 to gain access to capital. Nofo will use the earnings to improve her business .

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, yeast, eggs, baking soda and dripping oil for her business

loans.name: Lepopea

texts.en: Lepopea is a 35-year-old woman who is married with five children. She has a small business, lawn mowing.  She has been doing this business for one year. Lepopea needs a loan to buy two lawn mowers and oil. She will use her profits to improve her business and to help her family. Lepopea joined SPBD in 2014 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy two lawn mowers and oil

loans.name: Demetrio

texts.es: El señor Demetrio tiene 34 años de edad es una persona responsable y trabajadora, tiene 2 hijos en la escuela y dos hijos en edad pre escolar quienes dependen económicamente de él, vive en una comunidad alejada del centro poblado de mizque, desde muy temprana edad se dedica a la agricultura por tal razón no pudo culminar sus estudios. Sufrió la pérdida de sus cosechas en la temporada anterior por las constantes lluvias,  y los pocos productos que cosecho los vendió a precios muy bajos, por estos motivos su estabilidad económica ha sufrido un desequilibrio, afectando directamente en la adquisición de los materiales e insumos requeridos para la producción como también en la adquisición de víveres para la canasta familiar y para  la educación y alimentación de sus hijos. Para continuar trabajando solicita un crédito para la compra de semilla de papa, semilla de arveja, abono orgánico, abono químico y agroquímicos, de esta forma incrementara sus ingresos y mejorara la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en: Demetrio is 34 years old and is a responsible and hardworking person. He has 2 children in school and 2 children who are pre-school age, all are financially dependent on him. He lives in a remote village community in the region of Mizque. From an early age, Demetrio has been engaged in farming and could not complete school because of this reason. He suffered the loss of his crops in the previous season due to constant rains. The few products he harvested were sold at the lowest prices. For these reasons, he has had an imbalanced economic stability which directly affects his acquisition of materials and inputs for his farming and for income for his household towards things like food and education for his children. To continue working, he is requesting a loan to purchase seeds for potatoes and peas, organic manure, chemical fertilizer, and agrochemicals to increase his income and improve the quality of life for his family.

loans.use: to purchase potato and pea seeds, organic manure, and more.

loans.name: Marizel

texts.en: Marizel is 36 years old and single. She lives in a rural community, where she buys and resells rice and hog feed to generate income. Despite hardships, Marizel aims to become successful and financially stable in the future. She would like to improve her business and make it profitable to earn a higher income. Marizel planned to increase her product offerings but she has insufficient capital. For this reason, she is asking for a loan of PHP 15,000 to buy more stocks of rice, hog  feed and grocery items to sell. She believes that, someday, she will further improve the business through this financial assistance.

loans.use: to buy more stocks of rice, hog feed and grocery items to sell

loans.name: Avarina

texts.en: Avarina is an 18-year-old woman who is single with no children. She plans to start a small business, an ice cake business.  Avarina needs a loan to buy cordial, foam cups, sugar and a cooler. She will use her profits to help her family. Avarina joined SPBD in 2014 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy cordial, foam cups, sugar and a cooler

loans.name: Mwanamunda

texts.en:
Mwanamunda is a married woman with one child who is an adult. She lives in her own house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food.

For the past six years, she has been selling goats at the market to the general public. The main challenge for her business has been unstable market prices. 

She joined Yehu in order to gain access to funds. She is requesting a loan to purchase more goats for her business.

loans.use: to purchase more goats for her business.

loans.name: Carlos Bolivar

texts.es: Carlos Bolivar, tiene la edad  de 56 años, está viudo, vive con sus hijos que son su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de una vaca con una cría al destete y también se encuentra preñada. La idea es aprovechar el espacio que tiene de pasto y las buenas condiciones de terreno y clima para poder tener estos animales y a la vez obtener leche  para la venta y desarrollar terneros para en el futuro venderlos para carne. Con esta compra podrá desarrollar una actividad más, y a la vez tener un ahorro que le permitirá ir teniendo más animales e invertir más en la propiedad.  Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Él no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Carlos Bolivar, at the age of 56, is a widower. He lives with his children, who are his number one priority. With his loan he hopes to be able to purchase a pregnant cow with a weaning calf. The idea is to take advantage of his pasture space, the favorable land and weather conditions to be able to keep these animals, and at the same time get milk to sell and raise calves to sell for meat in the future. With this purchase he will be able to develop one more source of income, and at the same time have a savings that will allow him to continue keeping more animals and investing further in the property. This is the first loan he has received through FUDECOSUR. He has not had other loans with state banks before, but FUDECOSUR has offered him the loan with better terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy a cow for milk.

loans.name: Umazi

texts.en:
Umazi is asking for a loan because she believes that through it she will improve her business.  The previous loan enabled her to get extra income from her business selling goats and cattle.  In addition, Umazi operates a shop kiosk.  She is requesting a loan to purchase rice, wheat flour and cooking oil for her business.

She feels that she was able to make a good investment with her previous loan, which to date, has allowed her to maintain her level of profits to help her family cover their personal expenses.

loans.use: to purchase rice, wheat flour and cooking oil for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase calves.

loans.name: Mariam

texts.en:
Mariam is a married woman with six children, five of whom attend school and one under school age. She owns a house that has electricity and piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees. 

For the past ten years, she has operated her rental house business. She faces a major challenge of maintenance on her rental houses.

With the loan, she wants to purchase building materials for her rental houses. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase building materials for her rental houses

loans.name: Njira

texts.en:
Njira is a married woman with seven children, all of whom are adults. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food. 

For the past ten years, she has operated a shop kiosk business, selling to her neighbours and passersby. 

With the loan, she wants to purchase salt, bread, milk, soft drinks, rice, sugar, beans and sweets for resale. She decided to join Yehu to get financial support.

loans.use: to purchase salt, bread, milk, soft drinks, rice, sugar, beans and sweets for resale.

loans.name: Victor Manuel

texts.es:
Victor de 31 años de edad, estudio hasta noveno grado,  está acompañado la esposa se dedica a los oficios  domésticos.  Victor en esta relación tiene un hijo que aún  no estudia.

Victor  se dedica a la agricultura desde que tenía 15 años de edad, este trabajo se lo enseño el papá ya que desde pequeño les enseño este trabajo, para que en un futuro se pudieran defender este trabajo le queda a una distancia de 25 minutos y él viaja a pie; también se dedica a la venta de frutas como aguacate y guineo ya que él y la esposa compran las cosechas de dichas frutas y la venden a las personas que van al mercado en esto le ayuda la esposa y el hijastro.

El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para pagar mano de obra que le ayuden a cultivar,  a limpiar la tierra; ya que solo él,  la esposa y el hijastro sienten que se tardan con los trabajos y así desde luego iniciaran a preparar la tierra;  pero también Victor con lo demás del dinero comprara un ternero,  ya que él tenía dos, pero uno se le fue a una ladera y se le quebró por completo y así le buscara compañero porque cuando crezcan ellos serán los que jalaran el maíz a la casa
texts.en:
Victor is 31 and studied up to 9th grade. He is accompanied by his wife, who handles the work around the house. Victor has a son in this relationship who does not study yet. 
Victor has been in agriculture since he was 15, a trade he learned from his dad from a young age who taught him so he would be able to take care of himself in the future. The work is about a 25 minute trip away and he travels on foot. He also sells fruit, such as avocado and banana. His wife and him buy the harvest of said fruit and sell them to people at the market, his step son also helps with this task.
The loan he is requesting will be used to hire labor to help him cultivate and clean the land as him, his wife and his step son alone feel they take too long with the work. In this manner they will begin to prepare the land. 
Victor also wants to use the rest of the money to buy a calf. He used to have two, but one fell down a slope and was injured irreparably. He will look for a companion for the remaining one because when they grow they will be the ones who pull the corn for the home.

loans.use: hire labor to help him farm and clean the land and to buy a calf

loans.name: Mutindi

texts.en:
Mutindi is a married woman with one child who attends school. She owns a house that neither has electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees. 

For the past four years, she has operated a food shop business, selling to her neighbours and passersby. She mentioned price fluctuation as her major challenge. She dreams of establishing a wholesale shop in the future.

With the loan, she wants to purchase sweets, biscuits, bread, milk, soft drinks, rice, beans, and cooking oil. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase sweets, biscuits, bread, milk, soft drinks, rice, beans, and cooking oil.

loans.name: Razia

texts.en: Razia, age 31, is a married woman and the mother of four children. For five years, she has been running a business selling milk with the help of her husband. She has one buffalo and two cows. Because of her work, she is respected in her home. She helps her husband in all family matters, as well as financial matters. She has some savings and applied for a loan of PKR 40,000 to purchase another buffalo. She is in her third loan cycle and has shown good repayment behavior. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business.

loans.use: to purchase another buffalo.

loans.name: Silvina

texts.en: An $800 loan is offered to Silvina to improve her business. She has a second hand business where many people come to buy every day. She will buy some additional supplies such as pants, shirts, pillows, shorts and sportswear. She has been involving herself in business activities since 2002. She feels comfortable to run her business because she can earn money every day. Running a business has made Silvina independent because she can be responsible for herself and also help her family. She hopes to run a bigger business in the future.

loans.use: to buy pants, shirts, pillows, shorts and sportswear for her business

loans.name: Faimasasa

texts.en: Faimasasa is a 56-year-old married woman with 7 children. She has a plantation and grows taro crops, banana crops, taamu crops, and yam to earn a living. She has been doing this for many years. Faimasasa has requested a loan to buy chemicals, taro crops, backpack sprayer, barbed wire, empty water gallon, chain saw and wheelbarrow. She has been a member of SPBD since 2010. With her profits, Faimasasa hopes to support her business and also to support her family.

loans.use: to buy farm inputs for her farm

loans.name: Frank

texts.en: Frank lives in Hoima Uganda. He is married with three children. He deals in produce buying and selling, especially maize. He started his business so as to supplement family income. He earns side income from his banana business. His clients are the business men and women around his area. He hopes to grow the business into new market areas but faces a difficulty of high transport charges. Frank will use the loan to stock maize to sell.

loans.use: to stock maize to sell.

loans.name: Juán Vicente

texts.es: Juán Vicente, tiene la edad  de 68 años, está casado, vive con su esposa  que es su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de fertilizantes para aplicarlo a inicio de lluvias, fungicidas y pagar mano de obra en trabajos de asistencia para el café, además de comprar algunas plantas de almácigo para hacer resiembras a inicio de lluvias esto con el objetivo de aumentar la densidad de plantas por área, además de aprovechar la buena fertilidad del suelo y las condiciones de clima y otras que favorecen al cultivo de café. Con estas mejoras al cultivo espera obtener un poco de ganancias y así mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia y también invertir un poco más en el área de cultivo y también cumplir algunas metas.  Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Él no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Juán Vicente, 68, is married. He lives with his wife who is his top priority. With his loan, he intends to buy fertilizers to apply at the beginning of the rainy season, fungicides, and to pay laborers for their work on his coffee crops. He will also buy plants from seedlings to replant at the start of the rains. He aims to increase plant density on his farm while taking advantage of the good soil fertility, climate, and other conditions that are favorable for the cultivation of coffee. With these improvements to the crop, he expects some profits to improve the lives of his family and invest a little more in agriculture to meet his goals. It is the first loan he has received from FUDECOSUR. He has not had a loan from national banks but FUDECOSUR has offered a loan with better terms and interest rates.

loans.use: to increase his coffee production

loans.name: Pepefa

texts.en: Pepefa is a 37-year-old married woman with 1 child. She owns a taxi and she needs a loan to buy a new taxi sign, new tires, engine oil, and to pay for her taxi's business license. She will use her profits to develop and support her family financially. Pepefa joined SPBD in 2014 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy a taxi sign, tires, engine oil, and to pay for the license.

loans.name: Milton

texts.en: Milton is a 49-year-old male. He is engaged in a bar business that sells both soft drinks and beers. Milton started the business to increase on his income; he also earns a government salary. Milton hopes to educate his children to high institutions of learning, though he is challenged by little and delayed salary payment. Milton is a hardworking man who needs a loan to pay school fees for his children.

loans.use: to pay school fees for his children.

loans.name: Kenneth

texts.es: Kenneth, tiene la edad  de 37 años, está casado,  vive con sus hijos y esposa, los cuales son su mayor prioridad. El con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de madera de buena calidad para hacer la fabricación de muebles, y de esta manera poderle ofreces a los clientes una mayor cantidad de productos con materiales de alta calidad y de mejores acabados y todos de buena calidad. Con esta compra pretende tener mejores ingresos para invertir más en su negocio y cumplir metas que en el futuro le mejorará su calidad de vida para él y su familia. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Kenneth is 37 years old and married. He lives with his wife and children, who are his number one priority. With his loan he hopes to purchase quality wood to make furniture. In this way he will be able to offer his customers more products made from high-quality materials and with better finishes - all of good quality. With this purchase he hopes to have a higher income to further invest in his business and meet his goals to improve the quality of life for himself and his family. This is the first loan he has received through FUDECOSUR. He has not had other loans with state banks before, but FUDECOSUR has offered him the loan with better terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to purchase wood to make furniture.

loans.name: Joshua

texts.en:
Joshua is a 51-year-old married man living in Kamwenge- Uganda. He deals in the selling of second hand clothes as his main source of income alongside milk production and agriculture. He started this business to earn a living and look after his family. He faces a challenge of competition and seasonal customers but has hopes that he will own a wholesale boutique that will enable him get higher profits.

Joshua is requesting a loan to buy more second hand clothes to sell.

loans.use: to buy more second hand clothes to sell.

loans.name: Francisco Candelario

texts.es:
Francisco de 66 años de edad,  es un agricultor que no logro estudiar debido a que sus padres no lo pudieron enviar  a estudiar; sino que lo mandaron desde muy pequeño a trabajar.  Su esposa falleció de una enfermedad, sus hijos dos ya no viven con él , solo vive a su lado un nieto que  por la distancia a su lugar educativo decidió quedarse a su lado.  


Francisco desde muy pequeño cuando sus padres le enseñaron a cultivar  maíz, esa es su actividad a la cual se dedica desde que tenia 10 años de edad.  Ahora él  cultiva dos hectáreas de tierra la cual alquila cada año en Abril o Mayo para ir preparando la tierra. Se levanta muy temprano para ir a ver la cosecha cuando esta ya esta sembrada.


El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para pagar el alquiler de otra hectárea de tierra  mas  y los fondos que él posee no le alcanzan para cultivar esa otra hectárea y él sabe perfectamente que solo lo lograra con la ayuda del crédito y con la ganancia  que cultivara podrá pagar los estudios de su nieto  .

El sueño de Francisco es que  su nieto logre graduarse del bachillerato sin ningún problema, ya que él no tubo esa oportunidad cuando era joven, ahora él le esta dando a su nieto y sabe que lo podrá lograr con la ayuda del crédito.
texts.en:
Francisco, 66, is a farmer who could not study because his parents could not send him to school. Instead, they sent him to work very young. His wife passed away due to illness and his two children no longer live with him. He lives with a grandchild because he lives closer to his grandson's school. Therefore, his grandchild stays by his side.

Francisco was very young when his parents taught him to cultivate corn which is the work he has done since he was 10 years old. Now, he cultivates two acres of land which he rents each year in April or May to start preparing land. He gets up very early to go see the crops he has already planted. 
The loan he is requesting is to pay the rent of another hectare of land. The funds he has on his own are not sufficient enough to cover another hectare. He knows he can only achieve this goal with the help of a loan. With his profits, he can pay for the studies of his grandson. 

Francisco's dream is that his grandson will achieve a high school diploma without any difficulties since he did not have this opportunity when he was young. Now he can give his grandson what he needs with the help of this loan.

loans.use: to pay rent on an additional hectare of farmland.

loans.name: Gladys

texts.en:
Gladys is a married woman who has been blessed with five children, two of whom are in school. She lives in her own house that has piped water but no electricity. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees.

Gladys operates a charcoal selling business, selling from home to her neighbours and villagers. Her greatest monthly challenge is high cost of transportation.

She is requesting a loan to purchase charcoal for resale. She joined Yehu to get financial support.

loans.use: to purchase charcoal for resale

loans.name: Naseem

texts.en: Naseem is a 31-year-old married woman. She has run a business of hand-embroidery for about two years. She is zealous about her work, and client demand is strong.  But business challenges, combined with family expenditures, frustrate her nearly every day. Naseem’s embroidery patterns are very popular on her street and she is the best earning resource in her household. She wants to grow her business, so she requested a loan of 40,000 PKR, to buy raw materials such as spools of thread and packs of sequins, beads and pearls in large quantities to meet the increasing demand. She is in her 3rd loan cycle and has shown good repayment behavior.

loans.use: to buy raw materials such as spools of thread and packs of sequins, beads and pearls in large quantities.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase construction materials.

loans.name: Sharafniso

texts.ru: Шарафнисо доброжелательная и открытая душой женщина. Ей 53 года. Она живет в селе района Хамадони с мужем и четырьмя детьми. Ее муж работает в Государственной автомобильной инспекции. А дети взрослые и самостоятельные. Шарафнисо всю жизнь была домохозяйкой и нигде не работала. Она все эти годы была занята хозяйством и воспитанием детей. Теперь когда ее дети уже подросли, у нее много свободного времени. Она хочет воспользоваться этим временем и заняться собственным делом. Шарафнисо любит ухаживать за скотом, в ее хозяйстве имеется одна дойная корова. Она хочет начать теперь бизнес по откорму и продаже скота. Шарафнисо тоже хочет зарабатывать себе на жизнь и чувствовать себя независимой. Так как для реализации цели ее начального капитала не хватает, она обратилась за кредитом, на сумму которого планирует закупить несколько голов бычков и телят. Ей важна Ваша поддержка.
texts.en:
Sharafniso is a good-hearted woman. She is 53 years old and lives in a village in Hamadoni with her husband and four children. Her husband works in a State Auto Inspectorate. Her children are grown and independent. Sharafniso has always been a housewife and has not worked anywhere. All these years she has been running their domestic lives and raising their children.  

Now that her children are grown, she has a lot of free time. She wants to use this time to start her own business. Sharafniso loves to look after cattle--she has one dairy cow. She wants to start business fattening and selling livestock. 

Sharafniso also wants to earn her own income and feel independent. She does not have the seed capital, and thus took a loan to buy a few steer and calves. Your support is important to her.

loans.use: to buy a few steer and calves to start her own livestock business.

loans.name: Patapampa Al Progreso Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “PATAPAMPA AL PROGRESO” de la Asociación Arariwa desde hace varios años atrás y les va muy bien, ellos viven en la provincia de La Convención del distrito de Echarate en el sector de Patapampa. 

Nemesia tiene 40 años y tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene cuatro hijos, ella se dedica a la venta de golosinas, gaseosas, tortas, pasteles y otras cosas mas, ella tiene un puesto de venta donde expende sus productos, ella en sus horas libres se dedica a la agricultura y tiene varios terrenos de plantaciones de cacao, café y fruta, ella es una mujer emprendedora y trabajadora que saca adelante a su familia. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar fertilizantes y golosinas.

Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de agricultura, ganadería, venta de abarrotes y otros se dedican a trabajar en la municipalidad en diferentes áreas. Los socios agradecen a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se comprometen a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The members have belonged to the community bank "Patapampa Al Progresso" of the Asociación Arariwa for several years, and things are going well for them. They live in the La Convención province of the Echarate District in the Patapampa sector.

Nemesia is 40 years old. She is in a common-law relationship and has four children. She sells candy, soft drinks, cakes, and pastries among other things at her stall where she sells her products. In her free time, she works in farming and has several plots of cacao, coffee, and fruit. She is an enterprising and hardworking woman who supports her family. This time she needs a loan to buy fertilizer and candies.

The other partners work in farming, livestock, and selling groceries, while others work in the municipality in different areas. The partners thank those who help them achieve their dream through these loan, and they are committed to repaying their dues by the deadline.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and candies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase primary materials made up of textile leftovers.

loans.name: Rosibel

texts.es:
Rosibel  de 28 años de edad, estudio hasta 6° grado, dejo la escuela por la situación económica que vivían. Está casada y su esposo es peluquero, tienen 2 hijos y ambos están en la escuela, y nadie más vive con ellos.


 Rosibel  desde que tenía 15 años se dedica a vender panes y frescos, trabajo que aprendió de su mamá, y nos dice que hoy lo continua haciendo para ayudar a su esposo en los gastos del hogar, pues su deseo es que  no les falte nada a sus hijos y poder darles una mejor vida. Ella se levanta a las 5:00am para prepararles el desayuno a su esposo y a sus hijos, alistarlos y llevarlos a la escuela, luego regresa para hacer los frescos y los panes para luego trasladarlos donde tiene la peluquería su esposo y ahí se pone a vender. Al mediodía va a traer a sus hijos a la escuela, y la tarde la utilizan para ir a la iglesia, así es su rutina diaria


El crédito será invertido para la compra de cemento, hierro y arena para construir unos postes de cemento para cercar un terreno que posee.

Sus deseo son: construir su propia casa ( hoy viven en la casa de un familiar), que sus hijos estudien y se preparen en una carrera profesional, tener un negocio grande y pagar el crédito.
texts.en:
Rosibel is 28 years old, and went as far as sixth grade in school. She left school because of the financial situation her family were experiencing. She is married and her husband is a barber. They have two children who are both are in school, and no one else lives with them.

Rosibel has been selling sandwiches and fruit drinks for 15 years, work she learned from her mother. She tells us that today she continues doing it in order to help her husband with the household expenses, as their wish is that their children not lack for anything, and to give them a better life. 

She gets up at 5:00 a.m. to prepare breakfast for her husband and their children, and to get the children ready and take them to school. Later, she returns to make the fruit drinks and sandwiches, and then takes them to her husband's barbershop, where she starts to sell them. At mid-day she goes to get her children from school, and uses the afternoon to go to church. This is her daily routine. 

The loan will be used to buy cement, rebar and sand for building a few cement posts to enclose a parcel of land she owns.

Their wishes are: to build their own home (today they live in the home of a family member), for their children to go to school and be prepared for professional careers, and to have a large business and pay off the loan.

loans.use: To buy cement, rebar and sand for building a few cement posts to enclose a parcel of land she owns.

loans.name: Maria Rogelia

texts.es: La señora Maria, es soltera y no tiene hijos, vive con su padre. Es de la provincia chapare  del departamento de Cochabamba, se fue de su comunidad como la mayoría de las personas buscando mejores oportunidades, en su comunidad la producción bajo debido a los cambios climatológicos, que no se pueden controlar, la producción escaseo y por eso  decidió migrar al trópico al terreno de su padre, donde hoy en día trabaja en el sector agrícola y se dedica a la producción de piña y palta, tiene en producción de piña una hectárea con 17000 unidades y media hectárea de palta con 500 centenas, lo que comercializa a los intermediarios que le vienen a comprar al lugar. El crédito que está solicitando es para la construcción de vivienda de forma que logre independizarse y mejorar las condiciones en las que se encuentra.
texts.en:
Maria is single and does not have children; she lives with her father. She is from the Chapare province in the Cochabamba department. 

She left her community like the majority of people searching for better opportunities. In her community, production dropped due to climate changes, which cannot be controlled. Production became scarce, and because of this, she decided to migrate to the tropics to her father’s land where he currently works in the agricultural sector making a living from pineapple and avocado production. He has a hectare of pineapple crops with 17,000 units, and a half hectare of avocado with 500 hundreds, which he sells to the intermediaries that come to the land to purchase the crops. 

The loan that she is requesting is for the construction of a home so that she is able to become independent and improve the conditions in which she finds herself.

loans.use: to construct a home.

loans.name: Pedro Antonio

texts.es:
Pedro de 72 años de edad,  no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar debido a que sus padres nunca vieron importancia en el estudio. Está casado y su esposa se dedica al hogar, tienen 5 hijos, pero 4 ya están acompañados y solo 1 vive con ellos y una nieta.   

 Pedro se dedica a la agricultura desde que tiene 8 años, trabajo que le enseño su padre y él también se lo heredo a sus hijos. Él siembra maíz, frijol y maicillo.

Comenta que a pesar de su edad todavía tiene fuerzas para trabajar en la agricultura. Él se levanta a las 4:30 am para preparar su equipo de trabajo y llegar muy temprano al lugar donde trabaja, para llegar tiene que caminar unos 30 minutos. Luego para aprovechar, trabaja hasta unas 8 horas luego regresa a la casa a descansar, aunque a veces cuando tiene mucho trabajo prefiere llevar comida suficiente para trabajar otro rato por la tarde, así es su rutina diaria pero fue la forma que permitió sacar adelante a su familia.
 

El crédito será invertido  en la compra de semilla, abono y herbicidas, para la siembra de 7,000 metros cuadrados de maíz.

Su deseo es dejarle una casa al hijo que está con ellos cuidándolos, tener una yunta de bueyes para transportar su cosecha, comprar una vaca para tener la cuaja y su taza de leche hervida, pagar el crédito para tener las puertas abiertas en la institución.
texts.en:
Pedro is 72 years old.  He did not have the opportunity to attend school because his parents did not see the importance of education.  He is married and his wife cares for their home.  They have five children.  Four of them are married and only one lives with them with their granddaughter.

Pedro has worked as a farmer since he was 8 years old.  He learned the work from his father and he taught his children too.  He plants corn, beans, and sorghum.  He says that in spite of his age, he has the strength to work in farming.  He gets up at 4:30am to prepare his equipment and gets to his work location very early.  To get there, he has to walk for 30 minutes.  He then works for eight hours and returns to his house to rest.  Sometimes when he has a lot of work to do, he prefers to bring food to work for a while in the afternoon.  This is his daily routine but it is the way he has been able to move his family forward.

This loan will be invested in the purchase of seeds, fertilizer, and herbicides to plant 7,000 square meters of corn.  

Pedro's hope is to leave a house to his son who lives with them and cares for them, to have a pair of oxen to transport his crops, to purchase a cow, and to pay the loan to have the doors open at the institution.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizer, and herbicides to plant 7,000 square meters of corn.

loans.name: Fausto De Jesús

texts.es:
Fausto de 63 años de edad, es un agricultor que no logro estudiar porque sus padres no tuvieron las condiciones económicas para enviarlo a estudiar, actualmente está acompañado con su esposa  que le dio dos hijos los cuales están casados y viven bastante lejos de donde vive él.  Su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos  y solo vive con él un nieto que siempre lo ha apoyado mucho.

La principal fuente de ingresos de Fausto, es el cultivo del maíz ya que también es la fuente de ingresos de muchas personas de la comunidad; él se dedico a dicha actividad desde que era muy pequeño casi desde que tenía 14 años, dicha actividad la aprendió de su padre quien se la enseña por que su padre también era agricultor, también otra de las razones por las cuales se dedico a esta actividad fue por que le queda muy cerca casi a dos kilómetros de su hogar.

El préstamo que esta solicitando a CREDICAMPO, es para comprar  dos vacas lecheras, puesto que ya su edad no le permite trabajar como lo hacia antes en la agricultura, ahora quiere tener dos vacas productoras de leche ya que entra a la comunidad un carro lechero comprando la leche a muy buen precio y así podrá tener mayores ingresos y poder pagar la cuota del crédito y tener mejores ingresos.

El sueño que tiene es poder tener esas vacas, para  tener una cuota semanal para enviar a su nieto a la escuela todos los días, ya que con el ingreso del maíz no lo puede tener semanal o mensual así que necesita esas vacas y sabe que lo va a lograr con la ayuda del crédito.
texts.en:
Fausto, 63, is a farmer who wasn't able to go to school because his parents didn't have the economic resources to send him.  Currently he lives with his wife.  She gave him two children, who are married and live very far from him.  His wife is a homemaker.  Only a grandson lives with him; he always has supported him a lot.

Fausto's main source of income is growing corn, the same as a lot of people in the community.  He has worked this job since he was very young, about 14 years old.  He learned the work from his father because he was also a farmer.  Another reason he's in this line of work is because it's close to almost two kilometers from his home.

The loan Fausto's requesting from CrediCampo is to buy two dairy cows.  He can't work in agriculture the way he used to, so now he wants milk-producing cows because there's a milk truck that comes to the community buying milk at a good price.  That way he would be able to earn more income and pay back the loan.

His dream is to be able to get those cows so he has the weekly fee to send his grandson to school every day.  His income from the corn isn't weekly or monthly, so he needs the cows and knows he can achieve that with the help of the loan.

loans.use: to buy dairy cows

loans.name: Madaser

texts.en: Madaser is a 34-year-old, vigorous, married woman and the mother of three children. She has had a business doing hand-embroidery for the past four years. She is passionate about her work, and client demand is strong. But business challenges, combined with family expenditures, frustrate her nearly everyday. Her husband is employed as a sales person in a grocery store, but he does not earn enough to support his family well. Madaser’s embroidery patterns are very popular on her street, and she is the best earning resource in her household. She wants to grow her business. She requested a loan of 50,000 PKR to buy raw materials such as thread, sequins, and pearls in large quantities to meet the increasing demand. She shared her dream of running a training center for girls of her village. She is also interested in opening her own shop in the market to display her work.

loans.use: to buy raw materials such as thread, sequins, and pearls in large quantities.

loans.name: Tahani

texts.en:
Tahani is an ambitious young Yemeni woman. Due to difficult living conditions, she couldn’t complete her higher education and join the university. 

Though Tahani is only a secondary school graduate, she wants to have her own business in order to help her family in covering living expenses and to become an effective member in the society. 

As a woman, she believes that starting up an accessories store will be a successful and profitable business because of the demands of Yemeni women to buy different kinds of accessories, like jewelry, gloves, handbags, hats, belts, scarves, watches ,etc. 

Such a step can't be taken without the necessary capital. Tahani managed to collect some money from her father, but that was not enough. She still needs YER 1,500,000. She tried several times to find somebody to lend her the remaining amount, however, she didn’t find anyone. 

As a determined and optimistic woman, Tahani didn’t give up and become desperate. She headed to Al-Amal Microfinance Bank and requested a loan in the amount of YER 1,500,000 to start up her accessories store. 

Tahani hopes that her business succeeds, so she can have a decent and improved life for her family and herself and so she can continue her higher education in the near future, especially since she is still only 22 years old.

loans.use: to start up an accessories store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a new grill for his food stall.

loans.name: Brenda Mayency

texts.es: Brenda tiene 24 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su madre y su hija de 4 años de edad. Brenda se dedica a la comercialización de ropa y productos de belleza. La venta la realiza en el mercado central de su localidad desde hace 5 años. Gracias a su carisma y experiencia cuenta con muchos clientes que cada día la prefieren más. Este negocio es la principal fuente de ingresos de Brenda por lo que ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en su negocio en la compra mayor inventario de ropa y productos de belleza( faldas, blusas, pantalones,lociones, cremas, maquillaje, etc.) Espera poder contar con este financiamiento y a sí poder satisfacer una mayor demanda que le permita aumentar las ventas e ingresos y al mimo tiempo sus condiciones de vida y las de su familia.
texts.en: Brenda is 24 years old and lives in her own home with her mother and her 4 year old daughter. Brenda sells clothing and beauty products. She has been selling in the central market for the past 5 years. Thanks to her charisma and experience she has many customers that every day prefer her products more. This business is the principal source of Brenda's income so she has decided to seek a loan from FUSAI in order to invest in her business and buy at wholesale clothing and beauty products (skirts, blouses, pants, lotions, creams, makeup, etc.). She hopes to be able to depend on this financing and in this way be able to meet a growing demand that will enable her to increase sales and income while at the same time maintaining her quality of life and that of her family's.

loans.use: to buy clothing and beauty products such as skirts, blouses, pants, lotions, creams, makeup, etc.

loans.name: Nicaraguita Group

texts.es: El grupo lo integran tres socios trabajadores, coordinado por la señora Meyling de 22 años de edad, casada y madre de dos hijos de las edades de 2 y 4 años, comercializa cosméticos de la AVON y Zermat, con el crédito invertirá en productos como vanidad, pinturas labial, pinturas de uñas, delineador, sombras, rubor, perfumes para damas, perfumes para caballeros y más. Otra socia es la señora Alexandra de 37 años la cual comercializa ropa nueva en su domicilio y por encargo, y el señor Isidro de 47 años propietario de un taller donde se enmarcan cuadros y a la vez se hacen montaje en los cuadro, en su domicilio.
texts.en: This group consists of three hardworking members, coordinated by 22 year old Meyling. She is married and mother of two children ages 2 and 4. She sells AVON and Zermat cosmetics. With the loan she will buy a variety of products such as makeup, lipstick, nail polish, eye liner, eye shadow, blush, women's perfumes, men's colognes, and more. Another member is 37 year old Alexandra, who sells new clothing from her home and by order. And the third member is 47 year old Isidro who owns a shop that frames and mounts art, and his business is in his home.

loans.use: to buy makeup, lipstick, nail polish, eye liner, women's perfumes, and men's colognes.

loans.name: Esteban

texts.es: Esteban, tiene la edad  de 28 años, está soltero, vive solo. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de unos terneros de una raza que tengan un buen desarrollo y con una rápida ganancia de peso a corto plazo. La idea es aprovechar el espacio que tiene de pasto y las buenas condiciones de terreno y clima para poder tener estos animales y a la vez obtener un buen desarrollo de terneros para en el futuro venderlos para carne. Con esta compra podrá desarrollar una actividad más, y a la vez tener un ahorro que le permitirá ir teniendo más animales e invertir más en la propiedad.  Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Él no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Esteban is 28 years old, single, and lives alone. With his loan he plans to buy some calves, specifically a breed that develops well and gains weight quickly. The idea is to take advantage of his pasture space and the good condition of his fields and weather to be able to have these animals and at the same time raise the calves to sell them in the future for meat. With his purchase he will be able to grow his business and at the same time some savings that will permit him to continue having more animals and investing more in his property. This is the first loan that he has received from FUDECOSUR. He has not had previous loans from state banks, but FUDECOSUR has provided him a loan with greater ease of access and a lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy calves to raise.

loans.name: Octavia

texts.en: Octavia is a 39-year-old, married woman living in Kamwenge, Uganda. She deals in farming as her main source of income alongside selling a local brew known as waragi. She started this business to earn a living and look after her family. She faces challenges of competition, seasonal customers, and weather changes that stop customers from turning up, but has hopes that she will have a waragi factory in her village.  She is requesting a loan to buy farm inputs like fertilizers.

loans.use: to buy farm inputs like fertilizers.

loans.name: Suriya

texts.en: Suriya is a 30-year-old woman doing business selling milk for many years. She has two buffaloes that she milks. She sells milk to people in her community and earns a good amount to contribute to the family income. She has four children, all of whom attend school. She has improved her business in order to meet the day-to-day expenses of life. This is her fourth year with Kashf Foundation; she is happily running her business with support from Kashf Foundation. Now she requested a loan of 40,000 PKR to purchase one more buffalo. She hopes to increase her sales and profits.

loans.use: to purchase one more buffalo.

loans.name: Jacinta

texts.en: Jacinta is 51 years old, married, and has six children. She owns and operates a small store, selling items such as groceries and frozen goods. She has been doing this for many years. Jacinta needs a loan to buy chicken, sausages, mutton flaps, soft drinks, Vailima beers, snacks, corned beef, tinned fish, salt, noodles, milk, ice cream, toilet rolls, laundry powder, soaps, mosquito coils, and soy sauce. She hopes to use her profits to improve her business. She became a member of SPBD in 2010 to gain access to capital for her business.

loans.use: to buy a variety of food and household items to sell in her store.

loans.name: Seuao

texts.en: Seuao is a 47-year-old married woman with seven children. She has a small plantation and grows taro, taamu, yams, etc. to earn a living. She has been doing this for more than four years. Seuao has requested a loan to buy a weed sprayer, chemicals, bush knives, filings, and an axe. She has been a member of SBPD since 2010. With her profits, Seuao hopes to continue the development of her family and to pay for her children's education.

loans.use: to buy a weed sprayer, chemicals, bush knives, filings, and an axe

loans.name: Rasela

texts.en: Rasela is a 29-year-old, married woman with three children. She runs a small business selling pancakes in her community, and has been doing this for five years. Rasela has requested a loan to buy bags of flour, sugar, oil etc.  She joined SPBD in 2012 to gain access to capital.  Rasela will use her profits to support her family and save for unexpected emergencies.

loans.use: to buy bags of sugar, flour, oil ,a gas oven and more.

loans.name: Jorge Gerardo

texts.es:
El socio es el Sr. Jorge ; el socio sigue dedicándose al negocio de venta de laptops para los distintos clientes que le solicitan y a la vez continua trabajando para una institución privada de asesor financiero,el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone a su trabajo, él socio es una persona responsable y empeñoso, él socio desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando su familia.
El socio solicita el préstamo para comprar una laptop.
 El socio se siente agradecido por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Jorge is continuing his business of selling laptops to various customers that ask him for one and at the same time continues working for a private financial accounting business, which is going well thanks to the effort he puts into his work.

He is a responsible person and persevering. He wishes to be able to continue working and in this way support his family.

He seeks a loan to buy a laptop computer. He is grateful for the granted loan and promises to make his loan payments.

loans.use: to buy a laptop computer.

loans.name: Jaidenson

texts.es:
Él es Jaidenson, estudiante de Auxiliar De Enfermería , tiene un problema por el costo de la mensualidad para pagar la cantidad, la situación económica no le da hasta esa cifra, le toca duro en el trabajo, ya que le queda tarde de la noche y eso lo perjudica, ya qué hacer los trabajos que deja la profesora le queda  duro realizar lo, pero el hace lo posible para quedar bien en todo, el propósito no es dejar de estudiar y menos del instituto siempre ha querido estudiar esto primero porque ha tenido muchos casos en la vida personal como familiar y no ha tenido como ayudar, quiere seguir estudiando para ayudar a esas persona que necesitan de una mano y esa mano puede ser la de él. 
Escogió esta carrera porque es una manera de ayudar a las personas en la condición de enfermedad  que es lo que le gusta, ayudar al prójimo, en lo personal piensa seguir estudiando para llegar a ser un profesional, poder estabilizarse, tener la  propia casa, en lo familiar con los recursos ayudar a la madre, ya que ella ha luchado sola para poder lograr que el logre los objetivos y ser una buena persona con lo que tiene, sacarla del  pueblo, construirle la  propia casa y darle el apoyo como hijo, ya que ella ya hizo mucho por él, ahora le toca a el hacer por ella. 
Necesita el subsidio con kiva porque le ayudaría a pagar más fácil la mensualidad y porque le estaría ayudando y colaborando para poder lograr los proyectos de vida.
Los planes a futuros son nunca dejar de hacer lo que le gusta, estaría agradecido  con kiva, ya que puede seguir luchando por los proyectos de vida y contribuir con el mejoramiento en la salud del  país.
texts.en:
Jaidenson is a nurse's aide student, and has a problem paying the monthly payment. His economic situation doesn't provide enough income even though he works hard late into the night which makes it hard to complete his school work. It is hard to complete all the work the teacher assigns but he does his best to do it all well. He doesn't want to leave school of his program as he always has wanted to study this field because he has had many family medical situations and has not been able to help. He wants to continue studying in order to help people who need a hand and that hand can be his.

He chose this field because it is a way to help sick people, which is what he enjoys, helping one's neighbor. He plans to continue studying to become a professional in the medical field, to be able to support himself, have his own home, sharing resources with his mother as she has fought, alone, to be able to achieve her goals and be a good person that can leave the village, build her own home and provide support for her son. She has done a lot for him, and now it is his turn to support her.

He needs the Kiva subsidy because it will help more easily pay the monthly payment and because it will help and support him to be able to complete his life's projects. His future plans are to never stop the work he enjoys. He would be grateful to Kiva as it will enable him to continue fighting for his life's work and contribute to the improvement of the well-being of his country.

loans.use: to pay tuition for one semester

loans.name: Mwanajuma

texts.en:
Mwanajuma is a widowed woman, with four children who go to school. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are school fees and food for the family. 

For the past four years, she has operated a shop kiosk business, selling to her neighbors and passersby. She mentioned price fluctuation as her major challenge. She dreams of establishing a wholesale shop in the future.  With the loan, she wants to purchase salt, bread, rice, sugar, beans, and sweets for resale. She decided to join Yehu to get financial support.

loans.use: to purchase salt, bread, rice, sugar, beans, and sweets for resale.

loans.name: Shabeeran

texts.en:
Shabeeran, a 49-year-old married woman, runs a small boutique at home to provide for her family. She purchases cloth from the market at low prices, sews garments and then sells them to the people of her locality. She always has a great product selection to offer, and she earns a good income that contributes to her family's well-being.

For the improvement of her business, Shabeeran has requested a loan of 60,000 PKR. She will use the loan to buy a greater variety of cloth, and spools of thread in various colors. These purchases will allow her to fulfill the demands of her customers on time. With a good credit history, this will be Shabeeran's eighth loan.

loans.use: to buy a greater variety of cloth, and spools of thread in various colors.

loans.name: Michael Andrey

texts.es: Michael Andrey, tiene la edad  de 25 años, está soltero,  vive con sus padres y hermanos los cuales son su mayor prioridad. El con su crédito pretende hacer la compra repuestos de buena calidad para realizar la reparación de su carro de trabajo. Lo que quiere es poder comprar los mejores repuestos y de buena calidad para que su vehículo no le dé desperfectos a corto plazo y así poder cumplir con su trabajo de una forma más adecuada y eficiente. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Michael Andrew is 25 years old and unmarried. He lives with his parents and siblings, whom are his greatest priority. He plans to buy high quality replacement parts with this loan in order to repair his work car. He would like to buy the best high-quality parts around so that his car does not give him any trouble in the future. In this way, he will be able to fulfill his work to a satisfactory and efficient level. This is his first loan with FUDECOSUR. He has not received loans from state banks but FUDECOSUR has offered him the loan with great ease and low interest rates.

loans.use: to repair his work vehicle.

loans.name: Haneefan

texts.en:
Haneefan is 48 years old and a married woman. She has been running a business, selling milk, for many years. She has two cows in milk. She sells milk to many of her neighbors, along with butter that she makes from the milk. She is the mother of six children. She is very motivated to provide them a beautiful life, with good food, health care and clothing. She has improved her business to meet the day-to-day expenses of life.

This is Haneefan's fifth year with Kashf Foundation; she is happily running her business, with Kashf's support. Now she has requested a loan of 50,000 PKR. She will use this amount to purchase one more cow. She hopes to get an increase in milk-production capacity, which ultimately will help her in generating more cash.

loans.use: to purchase one more milk cow.

loans.name: Pedro

texts.pt:
Vive maritalmente, tem 44 anos de idade, estudou ate 6ª classe,  pai de 3 filhos todos estudantes e vive com seu irmão doente. Vive na casa própria á base de negocio de pastelaria, esta a tomar o credito pela 1ªvez.
Com o credito pretende comprar farinha em grande quantidade para o fabrico de pão na padaria e pastelaria que esta a gerir e que tem lá 7 trabalhadores.
Seu sonho é ampliar mais o negocio e liderar o mercado.
Seu desafio é o de não ter ainda estabelecimento próprio, esta a alugar.
texts.en:
Pedro is 44 years old and married. He completed 6th grade and has three children, all of whom are students. He lives with his ailing brother in a house that he owns. Pedro earns a livelihood through his pastry shop. This is his first loan.
With the loan he intends to purchase flour in bulk in order to make bread at the bakery and pastry shop that he runs. There he employs seven people.
His dream is to further expand his business and lead the market.
His challenge is not having his own business venue yet. He rents a space.

loans.use: to purchase flour in bulk in order to make bread.

loans.name: Francisca Zubiaga Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “FRANCISCA ZUBIAGA”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Santa Ana, perteneciente a la provincia de La Convención y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Liz Karen ella es conviviente y tiene 31 años y tiene 2 hijos La socia trabaja en su negocio de venta de ropa, la socia vende chompas, pantalones, polos, medias entre otras ropas, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m llevando a diferentes lugares como instituciones o sus amigos, la socia ya tiene 8 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es tener una tienda donde pueda vender la ropa. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar chompas, medias, polos pantalones y casacas.

La socia que esta tapada con un circulo su rostro ya no pertenece al banco comunal Francisca Zubiaga.
 
 Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de agricultura, negocio de venta de frutas, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de venta de comida.



La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The borrowers belong to the community bank, "Francisca Zubiaga." This bank is located in the district of Santa Ana, which belongs to the province of La Convención and Department of Cusco. 

The associate is Liz Karen. She has a partner, is 31 years old, and has 2 children. She works in her business of selling clothing. She sells sweaters, pants, and polo shirts, among other clothing items. She works from 8:00am to 7:00pm, going to different places like institutions or her friends' houses. She already has had this business for 8 years and it is going very well for her. Her dream is to have a store where she can sell the clothes. She is requesting the loan to buy sweaters, socks, polo shirts, pants, and jackets. 

The associate who has a circle on her face does not belong to the communal bank Francisca Zubiaga. 
 
The other associates work in businesses selling agricultural products, selling fruit, running a grocery store, and selling food. 

The borrower is thankful to those who form part of this dream, and she is committed to making the payments in the established installments.

loans.use: to buy sweaters, socks, polo shirts, pants, and jackets.

loans.name: Ana Maria

texts.es:
La socia es la Sra.: Ana; la socia sigue dedicándose al negocio de venta de productos de belleza ,la socia vende de forma ambulatoria a todos su clientes que solicitan sus productos, la socia vende diferentes tipos de productos como perfumes,cremas,colonias entre otros, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra  de colonias.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Ana is the borrower. She continues to work in the business of selling beauty products. She sells her products as a traveling merchant, visiting all her customers who request her products. She sells different types of products like perfumes, creams, colognes, among other products. She wishes to be able to continue working in this way to continue supporting her family. 

She is requesting this loan for the purchase of colognes. She feels grateful for the loan provided and is committed to completing her established payments.

loans.use: for the purchase of colognes.

loans.name: María Deysi

texts.es:
María de 46 años de edad, solo estudio hasta 2° grado debido a la pobreza que tenían sus padres, y también porque se encontraba lejos de la escuela. Es madre soltera de 3 hijos, pero ya todos se acompañaron, pero hay una que se quedó con su esposo a vivir con ella. Ella comenta que le toco sacar a sus hijos adelante sola,  pues su esposo la abandono cuando sus hijos estaban pequeños.  

María hoy se dedica a la crianza de pollos y gallinas, pues gracias a Dios sus hijos que hoy trabajan le dan para sus  gastos. Pero menciona, que antes trabajo en la agricultura, lavando ajeno, planchando, vendiendo pero todo lo hizo por sus hijos. Y hoy le agradece a su padre porque le enseño a trabajar desde que tenía 10 años. La llevaba a trabajar en las milpas y cuando quedo sola, al principio se afligió pero después tomo valor y supero ese obstáculo y logro que sus hijos salieran adelante. 

El crédito será invertido para mejorar la vivienda, quiere encerrar todo el terreno para tener sus pollos y comprar unas 400 yardas de cedazo, 2 quintales de alambre y construirá una champa para pollos de engorde.  

Su sueño es tener una granja de unas 1000 gallinas ponedoras, tener una granja de cerdos bolachines,  2 vacas que den leche y pagar el crédito para tener puertas abiertas.
texts.en:
María is 46 years old and completed only the 2nd grade due to her parent's poverty and also because the school was so far away. She is the single mother of 3 grown, married children but a daughter and her husband live with her. She comments that it was up to her alone to support her children and help them succeed, as her husband abandoned her when the children were little.

Today María raises chickens and hens; thanks to God her children today work and support themselves. But she mentions that previously she worked farming, doing laundry, ironing, and sales - doing all this to support her children. And today she thanks her father because he taught her how to work since the age of 10. He used to take her to work in the corn fields and when she found herself alone, at first she struggled but then found courage and overcame this obstacle and raised her children successfully.

The loan will be used to invest in her farm. She wants to enclose the land in order to have chickens and buy 400 yards of netting, 200 pounds of wire, and build a chicken coop to raise the chickens.

Her dream is to have a farm with about 1000 chickens, pigs, 2 cows for milking and to pay the loan in order to have open doors.

loans.use: to buy 400 yards of netting, 200 pounds of wire, and to build a chicken coop for meat birds.

loans.name: Mukhtaran

texts.en: Mukhtaran is a 43-year-old, married woman. She has been successfully running a small general store at the corner of her house. She offers a variety of grocery items at a reasonable price and has retained many customers who regularly shop at her store. Mukhtaran makes enough to provide for her family. To make her store fully stocked she requested a loan for PKR 40,000 that she will use to buy stocks of rice, sugar, and flour from the market at lower rates. In this way she would be able to meet the increasing demands consistently. She wishes to utilize part of her revenues to increase her business capital. She is in her 3rd loan cycle with good credit history.

loans.use: to buy stocks of rice, sugar and flour.

loans.name: Malick

texts.fr: MALICK est un jeune homme agé de 32 ans et vit avec ses parents. Il n’est pas marié et il est sans enfants. Il est mécanicien de profession et évolue dans l’achat et la vente des pièces détachées. Il a comme charge les besoins de ses parents et a une expérience de plus de 6 ans. Malick demande ce montant  pour acheter des pièces détachées comme les moteurs, dynamos et amortisseurs   à l’étranger pour ensuite les vendre. Il  veut   diversifier ses produits. Il comme sa journée à 9h pour la terminer à 18h. A l’avenir il souhaiterait aller en europe et importer des voitures d’occasion et motos pour augmenter ses revenus et épargner ses revenus.
texts.en: Malick is a young, 32-year-old man and lives with his parents. He is not married and has no children. He is a mechanic by profession and is developing in the buying and selling of spare parts. He is responsible for taking care of his parents, and he has more than 6 years of experience. Malick is asking for this sum to buy spare parts, like motors, dynamos, and shock absorbers from abroad in order to sell them. He wants to diversify his products. He starts his day at 9am and stops working at 6pm. In the future, he would like to go to Europe and import used cars and motorcycles to increase his revenues and save up.

loans.use: to buy spare parts in order to sell

loans.name: Clarita

texts.en: To have additional income, Clarita runs a small variety store within her community. She is 51 years old, and has three children. Her youngest child is still at college level, and she wants him to earn a degree so that he will become professional someday. Due to high cost of school fees, Clarita aims to improve her small store, to earn a higher income. Having inadequate capital, she is asking for a loan of PHP 5,000 to buy more stocks of canned goods, laundry soaps, noodles, eggs, beverages, seasonings, snack foods and soft drinks to sell. She believes that her loan will enable her to make more improvements in the business.

loans.use: to buy more stocks of canned goods, laundry soaps, noodles, eggs, beverages, seasonings, snack foods, and soft drinks to sell.

loans.name: Sokhna

texts.fr: SOKHNA est une jeune promotrice qui évolue dans la coiffure. Elle est mariée et mère de famille. Elle a une expérience de plus de 5ans dans cette activité. Sokhna aide son mari dans la gestion des dépenses quotidiennes de la famille.  Elle sollicite ce montant  pour acheter des greffages, mèches et des crèmes  pour renforcer son activité et satisfaire ses clients. Elle commence sa journée à 9h pour la terminer à 21h. A l’avenir elle souhaite avoir un complexe de coiffure et une boutique de produits cosmétiques ;
texts.en: Sokhna is a young entrepreneur who is developing her hairstying business. She is a married mother. She has more than 5 years of experience in this business. Sokhna helps her husband in managing the family’s daily expenses. She is seeking this sum to buy hair weaves, extensions, and creams to reinforce her business and satisfy her clients. She starts her day at 9am and finishes at 9pm. In the future, she hopes to have a hairstyling facility and a cosmetic products boutique.

loans.use: to buy hair weaves and extensions to build up her hairstyling business

loans.name: Mungu Ni Mwemwa Group

texts.fr: La cliente Françoise est une commerçante depuis 6 ans et membre d’un collectif d’affaires «Mungu ni Mwema»,  entrepreneur, âgée de 33 ans, mariée et mère de 7 enfants qui tous, étudient. Elle est vendeuse souliers usagés, elle fait le marché ambulatoire dans la ville. Elle sollicite un prêt auprès de Hekima pour accroitre ses activités. Elle va acheter 14 paires de souliers. Son conjoint est un agent dans un restaurant. Elle débuta avec de fonds reçu de son mari. Dans l’avenir, elle souhaite acheter une parcelle et la construire, scolariser et nourrir ses enfants. Elle remercie Hekima pour avoir bien choisi sa cible, en apportant un soutien aux femmes entrepreneurs exclues du système bancaire classique, tout en leur accordant des crédits sans garantie matérielle, surtout, pendant, la période post conflit dans la région de l’Est Pays.
texts.en: The client, Françoise, has been a business woman for 6 years, and is a member of a business group, Mungu ni Mwema, an entrepreneur, 33 years old, married, and a mother of 7, all of whom attend school. She sells used shoes as a traveling saleswoman in the city. She is seeking a loan from Hekima to grow her business. She is going to buy 14 pairs of shoes. Her spouse is an agent in a restaurant. She started her business with funds from her husband. In the future, she hopes to buy a plot of land and build, and to pay for her children’s schooling and food. She thanks Hekima for having chosen well its objective, by supporting female entrepreneurs excluded from the classic bank system, while giving them loans with no material guarantee, especially during the post-conflict period in the east region.

loans.use: to buy 14 pairs of shoes
